        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                P750 minimum na sahod isabatas                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1695782" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/02/1695782/p750-minimum-na-sahod-isabatas" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Gemma%20Garcia%20at%20Butch%20Quejada/"> Ni Gemma Garcia at Butch Quejada</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 2, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/02/1695782/p750-minimum-na-sahod-isabatas" st_title="P750 minimum na sahod isabatas     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/02/1695782/p750-minimum-na-sahod-isabatas" st_title="P750 minimum na sahod isabatas    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/02/1695782/p750-minimum-na-sahod-isabatas" st_title="P750 minimum na sahod isabatas    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/02/1695782/p750-minimum-na-sahod-isabatas" st_title="P750 minimum na sahod isabatas    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/02/1695782/p750-minimum-na-sahod-isabatas" st_title="P750 minimum na sahod isabatas    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/business/business-as-usual/20140106/electronics-industry.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Hinimok kahapon nina ACT Teachers Party-List Representatives Antonio Tinio at France Castro si Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte na taasan ang mga suweldo ng mga manggagawa at empleyado sa pampubliko at pribadong sektor at magpatibay ng isang maka-mamamayang tax reform. <strong>File </strong></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Hinimok kahapon nina ACT Teachers Party-List Representatives Antonio Tinio at France Castro si Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte na taasan ang mga suweldo ng mga manggagawa at empleyado sa pampubliko at pribadong sektor at magpatibay ng isang maka-mamamayang tax reform.</p>
<p>Sumama kahapon ang mga education solons sa ibat-ibang sektor sa pagtutulak ng pambansang minimum na sahod ng P750 kada araw para sa mga manggagawa sa pribadong sektor at P16,000 buwanang sahod para sa mga empleyado ng gobyerno. Ipinanawagan din nila ang pagbasura sa ipinanukalang bagong excise tax sa gasolina at VAT expansion na ang tatamaan ay ang mamamayan partikular ang mga mahihirap.</p>
<p>Napansin ni Castro na sa legislative agenda ni Duterte, pati na ang inihayag nito sa kanyang Philippine Development Plan 2017-2022, hindi kasama ang mga pagtaas ng suweldo ng mga manggagawa.</p>
<p>Ang mga guro sa pampublikong paaralan ay kabilang sa mga propesyonal at mga empleyado ng pamahalaan na naghihirap sa ilalim ng divisive schemes na magbigay ng karagdagang kompensasyon batay sa pagganap ng trabaho tulad ng Performance Based Bonus, Resulta-based Performance Management System at PBIS, ani Castro.</p>
<p>Ayon sa dalawang kongresista, ang kailangan nila sa sektor ng edukasyon ay minimum salaries na P25,000 para sa mga guro sa mga pampublikong paaralan, P16,000 para sa mga non-teaching staff at P27,000 para sa mga guro sa pampublikong unibersidad at kolehiyo.</p>
<p>Hinikayat din ni Bayan Muna Rep. Carlos Zarate si Pangulong Duterte na sertipikahan bilang urgent ang panukalangP750 daily minimum wage ng mga manggagawa.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Bukod dito hinamon din ni Zarate ang Pangulo na tuparin ang kanyang pangakong ihihinto ang exploitation sa mga manggagawa.</p>
<p>Kumbinsido rin ang kongresista na ang nasabing halaga ang kailangan ng pamilyang Pilipino para magkaroon ng disenteng buhay.</p>
<p>Paliwanag pa niya, napakababa at napako na ang kasalukuyang minimum wage kaya hindi makaagapay ang mga manggagawa sa napakataas na presyo ng mga bilihin at serbisyo.</p>
<p>Nanawagan din si Zarate sa liderato ng Kamara na paspasan ang pag apruba sa House bill 1208 para matigil na ang kontraktuwalisasyon at Endo.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Dating AFP chief itinalaga sa DENR kapalit ni Gina              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1697949" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/08/1697949/dating-afp-chief-itinalaga-sa-denr-kapalit-ni-gina" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 8, 2017 - 6:03pm</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/08/1697949/dating-afp-chief-itinalaga-sa-denr-kapalit-ni-gina" st_title="Dating AFP chief itinalaga sa DENR kapalit ni Gina @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/08/1697949/dating-afp-chief-itinalaga-sa-denr-kapalit-ni-gina" st_title="Dating AFP chief itinalaga sa DENR kapalit ni Gina" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/08/1697949/dating-afp-chief-itinalaga-sa-denr-kapalit-ni-gina" st_title="Dating AFP chief itinalaga sa DENR kapalit ni Gina" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/08/1697949/dating-afp-chief-itinalaga-sa-denr-kapalit-ni-gina" st_title="Dating AFP chief itinalaga sa DENR kapalit ni Gina" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/08/1697949/dating-afp-chief-itinalaga-sa-denr-kapalit-ni-gina" st_title="Dating AFP chief itinalaga sa DENR kapalit ni Gina" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/headlines/20170508/roy-cimatu-oath-office-denr.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Former military chief Roy Cimatu takes oath as new Environment secretary at the Malacaang Palace.<strong> Photo from Presidential Spokesperson Ernesto Abella</strong></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines  Itinalaga ni Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte ngayong Lunes si retired general Roy Cimatu bilang kapalit ni Gina Lopez bilang kalihim ng Department of Environment and Natural Resources (DENR).</p>
<p>Kinumpirma nina Executive Secretary Salvador Medialdea, Agriculture Secretary Emmanuel "Manny" Piol at Presidential Spokesperson Ernesto Abella ang pagkakatalaga kay Cimatu.</p>
<p>Dating hepe ng Armed Forces of the Philippines si Cimatu noong 2002 at naging special envoy to the Middle East sa ilalim ng administrasyon ni dating Pangulo at ngayoy Pampanga Rep. Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo.</p>
<p>Pinalitan ni Cimatu si Lopez na hindi nakalusot sa Commission on Appointments (CA).</p>
<p>Bago mapunta sa DENR, ginawang special envoy for overseas Filipino workers ni Duterte si Cimatu nitong nakaraang buwan.</p>
<p>If things would not go well, he is a candidate for  another (post). He is now part of Cabinet, but this time, I transferred him to a busier job, pahayag noon ni Duterte.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Ngunit tulad ni Lopez, kailangang lusutan ni Cimatu ang CA.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

					var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(po, s);
				  })();
				</script>
			</div></div>
		</li>
		<li class="rss">
			<a title="rss" href="http://www.philstar.com/rss" target="_blank" data-bitly-type="bitly_hover_card"><img src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/rss-gray.png"></a>
		</li>
		<li class="newsletter">
			<a title="subscribe to our newsletter" href="http://www.philstar.com/subscribe-to-newsletter" target="_blank" data-bitly-type="bitly_hover_card" ><img src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/newsletter-gray.png"></a>
		</li>
	</ul>
</div>  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

    <span class="element-invisible">Masthead, pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1</span><script language="javascript" src="http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/scripts/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script language="javascript" src="http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/scripts/masthead/masthead-all.1.1.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	//create element cycle
	philstarAdCycle_create("masthead-cont");
	(function($){
		//format eg: Nov 11, 2015 12:00 pm
		$('#masthead-cont').philstarAdCycle({
			1 : {  // ASEAN 2017
				photo : "http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/images/ads/masthead/20170425/masthead-asean-20170425.png",
				trackingUrl : "http://www.philstar.com/asean-2017?utm_source=philstar&amp;utm_medium=masthead1",
				dateStart: "April 25, 2017 12:00 am", 
				dateEnd: "May 1, 2017 12:00 am", 
			},
                        2 : {  // Binibining Pilipinas 2017
				photo : "http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/images/ads/masthead/20170427/masthead-binibining-pilipinas.png",

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/aster-amoyo.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Anne original choice sa pagiging lesbian ni Iza!                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698058" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698058/anne-original-choice-sa-pagiging-lesbian-ni-iza" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Aster%20Amoyo/RATED%20A">RATED A Ni Aster Amoyo</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 9, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698058/anne-original-choice-sa-pagiging-lesbian-ni-iza" st_title="Anne original choice sa pagiging lesbian ni Iza!    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698058/anne-original-choice-sa-pagiging-lesbian-ni-iza" st_title="Anne original choice sa pagiging lesbian ni Iza!   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698058/anne-original-choice-sa-pagiging-lesbian-ni-iza" st_title="Anne original choice sa pagiging lesbian ni Iza!   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698058/anne-original-choice-sa-pagiging-lesbian-ni-iza" st_title="Anne original choice sa pagiging lesbian ni Iza!   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698058/anne-original-choice-sa-pagiging-lesbian-ni-iza" st_title="Anne original choice sa pagiging lesbian ni Iza!   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/showbiz/20170509/Anne.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Anne Curtis</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>S</strong>a award-winning filmmaker, writer, editor, composer at musical scorer na si <strong>Jerrold Tarog </strong>namin nalaman na si <strong>Anne Curtis </strong>umano ang kanyang peg nang sulatin niya ang <strong>Bliss</strong> na nagbigay ng Best Actress trophy kay <strong>Iza Calzado </strong>sa recently-concluded <strong>Osaka International Film Festival. </strong>Pero dahil sa maselang tema ng istorya, binuksan niya sa audition (screen test) ang lead role at isa umano si Iza sa nag-audition making her the final choice.</p>
<p>Pero ang sad part, itoy binigyan ng R-18 rating ng <strong>Movie and Television Review and Classification Board (MTRCB) </strong>kaya hindi ito mapapanood ng mas nakakaraming audience simula ngayong Miyerkules, May 10.</p>
<h2>
	Bagong halal na presidente ng France lola na ang misis</h2>
<p>Ang 64-year-old wife na si <strong>Brigitte Trogneux-Macron</strong> ng 39-year-old newly-elected President ng France na si <strong>Emmanuel Macron </strong>ang pinakabagong First Lady ng Elysee Palace kapag umupo ang kanyang young husband and ex-student.</p>
<p>Sa kabila ng kanilang 25 year age gap, hindi ito nakaapekto sa panalo at papularidad ng bagong halal na pangulo ng France dahil malaki rin ang naging role ng kanyang misis na good enough to be his mother and a grandmother of 8.</p>
<p>Malaki ang papel na gagampanan ng bagong First Lady ng France na ang unang tutukan ay ang education reform ng kanilang bansa bukod pa siyempre sa iba pang role ng isang Unang Ginang na siya ring nag-i-edit ng mga speeches at intermediary ng kanyang husband.</p>
<p>President-elect Emmanuel Macron garnered 65.5% ng boto laban sa kanyang katunggali na si <strong>Marine Le Pen </strong>na nakakuha lamang ng 34.5%. Bukod sa outgoing President ng France na si Pres. <strong>Francois Hollande, </strong>nagpaabot na ng pagbati si US Pres. <strong>Donald Trump </strong>maging ang ibang pangulo at pinuno ng ibat ibang bansa at kasama na rito ang natalong kandidata sa pagka-pangulo na si Marine.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>First time sa kasaysayan ng France ang pagkakaroon ng First Lady na mas matanda di hamak sa kanilang uupong Presidente.</p>
<p>Alam mo, <strong>Salve A., </strong>dito muling pinatunayan na wala sa malayong agwat ng edad sa dalawang taong nagmamahalan at nagkakaintindihan at itoy kayang patunayan nina <strong>AiAi delas Alas </strong>at ng fianc niyang si <strong>Gerald Sibayan, </strong>nina Dra. <strong>Vicki Belo </strong>at Dr. <strong>Hayden Kho, </strong>to name a few.</p>
<h2>
	Vice pumiyok sa nangyari sa kanila ni Ervic Vijandre!</h2>
<p>Klinaro ni <strong>Vice Ganda </strong>na wala umano silang ugnayan ni <strong>Ervic Vijandre </strong>liban sa pagiging magkaibigan at barkada at pagiging business partner (ng Tipsy Pig) kung saan din kasama ang ex-boyfriend ni <strong>Bela Padilla </strong>at nauugnay ngayon sa aktres na si <strong>Angel Locsin</strong>, ang negosyanteng si <strong>Neil Arce.</strong></p>
<p>Si Ervic ay na-link noon kina <strong>Marian Rivera </strong>at <strong>Carla Abellana.</strong></p>
<h2>
	Gerald at Kim balik sa pagiging magkaibigan</h2>
<p>Halos pitong taon ang binilang bago muling nagtambal ang magka-loveteam na sina <strong>Gerald Anderson </strong>at <strong>Kim Chiu </strong>sa isang serye ng <em>Kapamilya </em>Network, ang <strong>Ikaw Lang ang Iibigin </strong>na kamakailan lamang nagsimula.</p>
<p>Inamin din ng ex-sweethearts na hindi umano nagkaroon ng closure ang kanilang break-up pero kapwa na sila nakapag-move on sa kanilang respective lives at bumalik na rin ang kanilang pagiging magkaibigan ngayon.</p>
<p>Si Kim ay nauugnay ngayon kay <strong>Xian Lim </strong>habang si Gerald naman kay <strong>Bea Alonzo</strong>.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                5-year drivers license umusad na sa Senado                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">

  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Malou%20Escudero/"> Ni Malou Escudero</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 10, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>

<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/10/1698370/5-year-drivers-license-umusad-na-sa-senado" st_title="5-year drivers license umusad na sa Senado   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/10/1698370/5-year-drivers-license-umusad-na-sa-senado" st_title="5-year drivers license umusad na sa Senado   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>

<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">

          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/metro/20161220/LTO-drivers-license-card.jpg" alt="" /></div>

<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">There is no opposition to proposals to extend the validity of drivers licenses. This committee, therefore, approves in principle measures seeking to amend Republic Act No. 4136 or the Land Transportation and Traffic Code, as amended by Batas Pambansa Bilang 398, extending the validity of all drivers licenses to five years, ani Poe matapos ang pagdinig. <strong>MICHAEL VARCAS</strong></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Umusad na kahapon sa Senado ang panukalang gawing limang taon ang kasalukuyang tatlong taong validity ng lisensiya ng mga driver.</p>
<p>Pumasa na sa Senate committee on public services na pinamumunuan ni Sen. Grace Poe ang panukala at inaasahang makakatulong sa mga driver.</p>
<p>There is no opposition to proposals to extend the validity of drivers licenses. This committee, therefore, approves in principle measures seeking to amend Republic Act No. 4136 or the Land Transportation and Traffic Code, as amended by Batas Pambansa Bilang 398, extending the validity of all drivers licenses to five years, ani Poe matapos ang pagdinig.</p>
<p>Naniniwala si Poe na dapat magkaroon pa rin ng batas kahit pa limang taon na ang validity ng mga drivers licenses sa ngayon.</p>
<p>Mas mababawasan aniya ang red tape at hindi naman kinakailangang madagdagan ng gastos ang mga magre-renew ng kanilang mga lisensiya.</p>
<p>Sabi ni Poe, kung gagawing limang taon ang validity ng lisensiya, mababawasan rin ang haba ng oras na kinakailangan nilang ipila tuwing ikatlong taon para lamang magpa-renew ng lisensiya.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Nauna rito, inilabas ng LTO ang Administrative Order No. 2016-034 noong nakaraang taon bilang tugon sa kagustuhan ni Pangulong Duterte na pahabain ang validity ng drivers licenses at maging ng passports.</p>
<p>Pinatitiyak naman ni Poe sa LTO na dapat ay mga karapat-dapat, kuwalipikado at disiplinadong mamamayan lamang ang mabibigyan ng lisensiya sa pagmamaneho.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/salve-v-asis.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Charice nakikitira lang daw talaga sa fan!                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698461" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/10/1698461/charice-nakikitira-lang-daw-talaga-sa-fan" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Salve%20V.%20Asis/"> Ni Salve V. Asis</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 10, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/10/1698461/charice-nakikitira-lang-daw-talaga-sa-fan" st_title="Charice nakikitira lang daw talaga sa fan!    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/10/1698461/charice-nakikitira-lang-daw-talaga-sa-fan" st_title="Charice nakikitira lang daw talaga sa fan!   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/10/1698461/charice-nakikitira-lang-daw-talaga-sa-fan" st_title="Charice nakikitira lang daw talaga sa fan!   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/10/1698461/charice-nakikitira-lang-daw-talaga-sa-fan" st_title="Charice nakikitira lang daw talaga sa fan!   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/10/1698461/charice-nakikitira-lang-daw-talaga-sa-fan" st_title="Charice nakikitira lang daw talaga sa fan!   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/palaro/20170510/Charice.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Charice</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - <strong>B</strong>akit ganun, ayon sa isang source talaga raw nakikitira ngayon si <strong>Charice</strong> sa isa niyang fan matapos silang maghiwalay ng partner niyang si <strong>Alyssa Quijano</strong>.</p>
<p>Ang sabi ng isang nakakilala sa kanya, nabenta na raw diumano ng singer ang mga naipundar nitong ari-arian noong kainitan ng kanyang career.</p>
<p>Maging ang nanay diumano ni Charice ay nakikitira na lang din kasi nga raw ay naibenta na rin nito ang bahay nila noon ayon sa isang dating kapitbahay nila. Ito ang rason kaya walang planong pumisan si Charice sa ina.</p>
<p>Ang kailangan daw talaga ngayon ni Charice ay trabaho para naman muli siyang makaipon.</p>
<p>Anyway, bukas ang pahinang ito kung meron anumang pahayag si Charice at ang kanyang inang si Ms. <strong>Raquel Pempengco</strong>.</p>
<div style="width:600px; background-color:#DDDDDD; color:#676767;clear:both; margin-bottom:20px">
	<img alt="" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/palaro/20170510/Richard-at-Angelica.jpg" style="height: 400px; width: 600px;" /><p style="text-align:left; padding:10px; margin-bottom:8px">Richard at Angelica</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

</div>
<h2>
	Richard itatambal kina Angel at Angelica</h2>
<p>Wow, balik-tambalan sina <strong>Angel Locsin</strong> and <strong>Richard Gutierrez</strong>. This time kasama nila si <strong>Angelica Panganiban</strong> sa isang pelikulang ipo-produce ng <strong>Star Cinema</strong>.</p>
<p>Kahapon ay nagkaroon na sila ng story conference pero wala pang binigay na information ang isang insider ng Star Cinema kung anong title o concept at kung isasali ito sa idaraos na taunang <strong>Metro Manila Film Festival (MMFF</strong>).</p>
<p>Ten years na pala ang last movie nina Angel at Richard sa <strong>GMA Films</strong>, ang <strong>Let the Love Begin</strong>. Kapwa <em>Kapuso</em> artists pa sila noon.</p>
<p>Sina Angel at Angelica naman ay nagkasama na sa pelikula ng Star Cinema, with <strong>Dingdong Dantes</strong>, ang <strong>One More Try</strong>.</p>
<p>Matagal-tagal na ring pahinga ang career ni Richard at si Angel at nag-back out sa papel na <strong>Darna</strong>. Si Angelica ay huling napanood sa pelikulang <strong>The Unmarried Wife</strong> last year.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Duterte binati ang   bagong S. Korean president                </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698760" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/11/1698760/duterte-binati-ang-bagong-s.-korean-president" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Rudy%20Andal/"> Ni Rudy Andal</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698760/duterte-binati-ang-bagong-s.-korean-president" st_title="Duterte binati ang   bagong S. Korean president   @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698760/duterte-binati-ang-bagong-s.-korean-president" st_title="Duterte binati ang   bagong S. Korean president  " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698760/duterte-binati-ang-bagong-s.-korean-president" st_title="Duterte binati ang   bagong S. Korean president  " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698760/duterte-binati-ang-bagong-s.-korean-president" st_title="Duterte binati ang   bagong S. Korean president  " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698760/duterte-binati-ang-bagong-s.-korean-president" st_title="Duterte binati ang   bagong S. Korean president  " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/headlines/20170407/duterte-independence-day.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">On behalf of the Filipino nation, President Rodrigo Roa Duterte wishes to extend his warm congratulations to Mr. Moon Jae-in on his election as the new President of the Republic of Korea (ROK), pahayag ni Presidential Spokesman Ernesto Abella. <strong>Presidential Photo/Karl Norman Alonzo</strong></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Nagpaabot ng pagbati si Pangulong Duterte sa nanalong pangulo ng Republic of South Korea na si Moon Jae-in sa nakalipas nilang halalan.</p>
<p>On behalf of the Filipino nation, President Rodrigo Roa Duterte wishes to extend his warm congratulations to Mr. Moon Jae-in on his election as the new President of the Republic of Korea (ROK), pahayag ni Presidential Spokesman Ernesto Abella.</p>
<p>Sinabi ni Abella, inaasahan ng gobyerno ang patuloy na magandang relasyon ng Pilipinas at South Korea sa ilalim ng liderato ni President-elect Moon.</p>
<p>The Philippines and the Republic of Korea have strong, comprehensive and long-standing bilateral ties. Our two countries have extensive cooperation on political, economic, cultural and people-to-people exchanges in the bilateral, regional, and multilateral spheres.The Philippines is committed to further enhancing the relations with the ROK under President-elect Moon. We wish him all the best, dagdag niya.</p>
<p>Isang former human rights lawyer si Moon at nagpahayag ng kahandaan na magkaroon ng dayalogo sa kalabang North Korea noong presidential campaign.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->


<!-- Start Teads TV Tags -->
<script type="text/javascript">
window._ttf = window._ttf || [];
_ttf.push({
       pid          : 33713 //DESKTOP
       ,lang        : "en"
       ,slot        : '.field-items .field-item > p'
       ,format      : "inread"
       ,mobile      : false
       ,minSlot     : 4
       ,components  : { mute: {delay :0}, skip: {delay :0} }
       ,mutable     : false
});
(function (d) {
        var js, s = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        js = d.createElement('script');
        js.async = true;
        js.src = '//cdn.teads.tv/media/format.js';
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(js, s);
})(window.document);
</script>

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                  Mga dawit sa krimen madali ng makikilala                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698687" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698687/mga-dawit-sa-krimen-madali-ng-makikilala" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Ricky%20T.%20Tulipat%20at%20Angie%20dela%20Cruz/"> Ni Ricky T. Tulipat at Angie dela Cruz</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698687/mga-dawit-sa-krimen-madali-ng-makikilala" st_title="  Mga dawit sa krimen madali ng makikilala    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698687/mga-dawit-sa-krimen-madali-ng-makikilala" st_title="  Mga dawit sa krimen madali ng makikilala   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698687/mga-dawit-sa-krimen-madali-ng-makikilala" st_title="  Mga dawit sa krimen madali ng makikilala   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698687/mga-dawit-sa-krimen-madali-ng-makikilala" st_title="  Mga dawit sa krimen madali ng makikilala   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698687/mga-dawit-sa-krimen-madali-ng-makikilala" st_title="  Mga dawit sa krimen madali ng makikilala   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/metro/20170511/QCPD-Digital-Sketch.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Ang mga high-tech na Digital Composite Sketch gadgets na ipinagkaloob ng QC govt sa QCPD <strong>(Kuha ni Boy Santos)</strong><br />
	</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><h2>
	High-tech na gamit ng QCPD</h2>
<p>MANILA, Philippines - Mas mapapadali na ang pagkilala ng Quezon City Police District (QCPD) sa sinumang indibiduwal na nasasangkot sa krimen dahil sa makabago at high tech na mga kagamitan sa pagguhit ng larawan o ang Digital Composite Sketch gadgets.</p>
<p>Ayon kay QCPD Director P/Chief Supt. Guillermo Lorenzo Eleazar, ito ay makaraang magkaloob ng 12-piraso ng Digital Composite Sketch Appliance na nagkakahalaga ng P18.6 milyon ang Quezon City local government sa pangunguna ni Mayor Herbert Bautista sa kanilang himpilan.</p>
<p>Sabi ng opisyal, kung dati ay halos hindi makita ang larawan ng mga suspek na nakukunan ng CCTV footage sa bawat krimen na kanilang ginagawa, sa ngayon ay magiging madali na ito bunga ng naturang mga kagamitan.</p>
<p>Sinabi pa niEleazar, malaki ang matutulong ng nasabing mga high tech na kagamitan sa paglutas ng kriminalidad, dahil dito ay malinaw uma-nong maiguguhit ng computer ang mga mukha ng mga suspek base ito sa magiging description ng isang witness.</p>
<p>Ilalagay ang nasabing mga Digital Composite Sketch Appliances sa 12 Police Stations ng QCPD para magamit sa investigationat mabilis na mailabas ang larawan ng mga individual na sangkot sa krimen.</p>
<p>Hindi rin umano mahirap gamitin ang nasabing Digital facial appliances dahil kahit umano hindi artist ay mada-ling makakaguhit ng larawan o sketch ng suspek base lang sa ibibigay na description ng testigo.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>

	padding: 0;
}
#block-block-30 .sponsored-posts .item-list li {
	float: left;
	width: 195px;
}
#block-block-30 .sponsored-posts .item-list li a {
	color: #0071b3;
	font-size: 0.9em;
	font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
	font-weight: bold;
}
.sponsored-posts-img {
	width: 100%;
	height: 130px;
	margin: 0;
}
.outbrain-content {
    width: 612px;
    float: left;
}
</style>

</div></div> <!-- /.section, /#footer-bottom-wrapper -->
    
<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Napoles nagpapalipat sa NBI                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698759" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/11/1698759/napoles-nagpapalipat-sa-nbi" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Gemma%20Garcia/"> Ni Gemma Garcia</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698759/napoles-nagpapalipat-sa-nbi" st_title="Napoles nagpapalipat sa NBI    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698759/napoles-nagpapalipat-sa-nbi" st_title="Napoles nagpapalipat sa NBI   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698759/napoles-nagpapalipat-sa-nbi" st_title="Napoles nagpapalipat sa NBI   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698759/napoles-nagpapalipat-sa-nbi" st_title="Napoles nagpapalipat sa NBI   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698759/napoles-nagpapalipat-sa-nbi" st_title="Napoles nagpapalipat sa NBI   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/nation/20170215/05_janet-napoles-arraignment.JPG" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Ayon kay Atty. Stephen David, abogado ng tinaguriang pork barrel queen, na dapat nang mailipat ng kustodiya si Napoles dahil ang BuCor ay para lamang sa mga convicted na preso. <strong>AP/File</strong></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Hiniling ng kampo ni Janet Lim Napoles sa Sandiganbayan na mailipat siya sa detention cell ng National Bureau of Investigation (NBI) mula sa Bureau of Corrections (BuCor).</p>
<p>Ayon kay Atty. Stephen David, abogado ng tinaguriang pork barrel queen, na dapat nang mailipat ng kustodiya si Napoles dahil ang BuCor ay para lamang sa mga convicted na preso.</p>
<p>Aminado naman si David na ang korte pa rin ang magdedesisyon kung saan dadalhin si Napoles kaya maging ang BuCor ay lumihan na rin sila sa korte para humingi ng paglilinaw kung saan siya ililipat ng kulungan.</p>
<p>Ang hakbang ng kampo ni Napoles ay matapos na ipahayag ni Justice Secretary Vitaliano Aguirre na maaari siyang magsilbing state witness sa reinvestigation ng pork barrel scam.</p>
<p>Sumulat na rin umano sa DOJ ang kampo ni Napoles at hihintayin na lamang nila ang kautusan mula sa korte kung tuluyan na siyang aalisin sa kustodiya ng BuCor.</p>
<p>Matatandaan na ipinawalang sala ng Court of Appeals si Napoles sa kinakaharap na kasong illegal detention.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>

					po.src = 'https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js';
					var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(po, s);
				  })();
				</script>
			</div></div>
		</li>
		<li class="rss">
			<a title="rss" href="http://www.philstar.com/rss" target="_blank" data-bitly-type="bitly_hover_card"><img src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/rss-gray.png"></a>
		</li>
		<li class="newsletter">
			<a title="subscribe to our newsletter" href="http://www.philstar.com/subscribe-to-newsletter" target="_blank" data-bitly-type="bitly_hover_card" ><img src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/newsletter-gray.png"></a>
		</li>
	</ul>
</div>  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

    <span class="element-invisible">Masthead, pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1</span><script language="javascript" src="http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/scripts/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script language="javascript" src="http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/scripts/masthead/masthead-all.1.1.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	//create element cycle
	philstarAdCycle_create("masthead-cont");
	(function($){
		//format eg: Nov 11, 2015 12:00 pm
		$('#masthead-cont').philstarAdCycle({
			1 : {  // ASEAN 2017
				photo : "http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/images/ads/masthead/20170425/masthead-asean-20170425.png",
				trackingUrl : "http://www.philstar.com/asean-2017?utm_source=philstar&amp;utm_medium=masthead1",
				dateStart: "April 25, 2017 12:00 am", 
				dateEnd: "May 1, 2017 12:00 am", 
			},
                        2 : {  // Binibining Pilipinas 2017
				photo : "http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/images/ads/masthead/20170427/masthead-binibining-pilipinas.png",

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Sotto inireklamo na sa Ethics  dahil sa na ano lang joke                </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698758" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/11/1698758/sotto-inireklamo-na-sa-ethics-dahil-sa-na-ano-lang-joke" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Malou%20Escudero/"> Ni Malou Escudero</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698758/sotto-inireklamo-na-sa-ethics-dahil-sa-na-ano-lang-joke" st_title="Sotto inireklamo na sa Ethics  dahil sa na ano lang joke   @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698758/sotto-inireklamo-na-sa-ethics-dahil-sa-na-ano-lang-joke" st_title="Sotto inireklamo na sa Ethics  dahil sa na ano lang joke  " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698758/sotto-inireklamo-na-sa-ethics-dahil-sa-na-ano-lang-joke" st_title="Sotto inireklamo na sa Ethics  dahil sa na ano lang joke  " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698758/sotto-inireklamo-na-sa-ethics-dahil-sa-na-ano-lang-joke" st_title="Sotto inireklamo na sa Ethics  dahil sa na ano lang joke  " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698758/sotto-inireklamo-na-sa-ethics-dahil-sa-na-ano-lang-joke" st_title="Sotto inireklamo na sa Ethics  dahil sa na ano lang joke  " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/banat/Opinyon/20170505/Ent.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Walong grupo ng mga kababaihan ang nagsampa ng 5-pahinang reklamo laban kay Sotto sa Ethics committee na pinamumunuan mismo ng senador. <strong>STAR/File</strong></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Sinampahan na kahapon ng reklamo sa Senate committee on Ethics si Senate Majority Leader Tito Sotto dahil sa kanyang na ano lang joke sa pagdinig noong nakaraang linggo ng Commission on Appointments (CA).</p>
<p>Walong grupo ng mga kababaihan ang nagsampa ng 5-pahinang reklamo laban kay Sotto sa Ethics committee na pinamumunuan mismo ng senador.</p>
<p>Sa panayam, sinabi ni Sotto na mag-i-inhibit siya sa pagdinig at ipapaubaya ang imbestigasyon sa pangunguna ng vice chairman ng komite na si Sen. Ping Lacson.</p>
<p>Matatandaan na sa pagtatanong ni Sotto kay Social Welfare Secretary Judy Taguiwalo noong nakaraang linggo, inusisa ng senador kung ilan ang anak nito sa kabila ng pagiging single o walang asawa.</p>
<p>Sinabi pa ni Sotto na kung gagamitin ang lengguwaheng kalye, ang tawag sa mga babaing walang asawa pero may anak ay na ano lang.</p>
<p>In the street language, if you have children and then you are single, ang tawag dun e na-ano lang, sabi ni Sotto sa hearing.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Nais ng mga nagreklamo kay Sotto na sumailalim ito sa gender sensitivity training kasama ang iba pang miyembro ng CA at mga staff na tumawa sa joke ni Sotto.</p>
<p>Dapat ring aniyang i-reprimand ng liderato ng Senado si Sotto dahil sa pagbibitaw ng nasabing joke na patama sa mga single parents.</p>
<p>Binatikos rin sa reklamo ang pananahimik ng CA sa biro ni kontrobersiyal na pahayag ni Sotto na maituturing umanong pagkunsinti sa ginawa ng senador.</p>
<p>Nakasaad rin sa reklamo na dapat magsilbing magandang halimbawa sa publiko si Sotto at lahat ng opisyal ng gobyerno.</p>
<p>Tiniyak naman ni Sotto na sa sandaling matanggap niya ang reklamo ay agad siyang mag-i-inhibit at maghahain ng leave.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">

</ul>    </div>

    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">

  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");

	.link-wrapper {
		position: relative;
		top: 33px;
	}
	.region.article-ad-region.clearfix.article-ad-box {
		width: 0;
	}
	#article-bottom #block-block-32 {
		margin-top: 10px;
		position: relative;
		top: 0;
	}
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">		
	jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
		$("#disqus-anchor").click(function(event) {
			event.preventDefault();
			$('html,body').animate({scrollTop:$(this.hash).offset().top}, 600);
		});
	});		
</script>

      <div id="footer" class="clearfix">
        <div class="region region-footer">
    <div id="block-boxes-footer-message-headlines" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-simple">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id='boxes-box-footer_message_headlines' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><style type="text/css">
/* footer */
#block-block-35 h2 {
    display: none;
}
.col-50 {
    float: left;
    width: 50%;
    position: relative;
}
.col-50.left::after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	right: -1px;
	bottom: 0;
	width: 1px;
	background-color: #ffffff;
}

#footer .block .content {
    background-image: none;
}

    padding-left: 140px;
    min-height: 50px;
}

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/tony-katigbak.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Nagparamdam na naman  ang mga terorista                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698783" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698783/nagparamdam-na-naman-ang-mga-terorista" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Tony%20Katigbak/KUNSABAGAY">KUNSABAGAY Ni Tony Katigbak</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698783/nagparamdam-na-naman-ang-mga-terorista" st_title="Nagparamdam na naman  ang mga terorista     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698783/nagparamdam-na-naman-ang-mga-terorista" st_title="Nagparamdam na naman  ang mga terorista    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698783/nagparamdam-na-naman-ang-mga-terorista" st_title="Nagparamdam na naman  ang mga terorista    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698783/nagparamdam-na-naman-ang-mga-terorista" st_title="Nagparamdam na naman  ang mga terorista    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698783/nagparamdam-na-naman-ang-mga-terorista" st_title="Nagparamdam na naman  ang mga terorista    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>SINABI ni National Capital Region Police Officer (NCRPO) chief Director Oscar Albayalde na ang dalawang magkasunod na pagsabog sa Quiapo ay dahil umano sa clan war at walang kinalaman ang terorismo. Akoy hindi naniniwala sa alegasyon ni Albayalde dahil ang pinasabog na bomba sa Quiapo ay gawain ng mga terorista. Inako na nga ng ISIS yung pagsabog noong April 28 pero hindi pa rin kumbinsido ang Philippine National Police (PNP) na ito ay gawa ng mga terorista. Sablay na naman ang intelligence report ng PNP.</p>
<p>Mabuti na lang at hindi nangyari ang sunud-sunod na pagpapasabog ng bomba nung ginanap ang ASEAN leaders summit sa PICC. Kung nagkataong nangyari yan mapapahiya ang ating bansa baka magdalawang isip na ang mga lider ng ibat ibang bansa na pumunta rito. Kasunod ng pagsabog ay ang anunsiyo agad ng UK at inabisuhang iwasan ng mga British national na pumunta sa Quiapo. Maaaring magsusunuran ng mag-abiso ang ibang bansa at kung magtutuluy-tuloy ang ganitong pangyayari sa ating bansa malamang turismo ang maaapektuhan. May posibilidad na mag-anunsiyo ang mga pangulo ng ibang bansa na huwag munang pumunta ang kanilang mga kababayan sa Pilipinas dahil baka sila ay makidnap o kaya naman ay maging biktima ng krimen.</p>
<p>Di ba nung pagkaupo ni US Pres. Donald Trump ay nagsabi agad sa mga Kano na iwasan ang Pilipinas dahil daw ang ating bansa ay isa sa pinagkukutaan ng mga terorista. Nung isang araw sinabi ni PNP chief Dir. Gen. Ronald Bato dela Rosa na mukhang nagkaroon ng pagkukulang ang kanilang intelligence report. Yan lang ang inaasahan ng ating mga kababayan ang protektahan ang ating bayan.</p>
<p>Kulang pa ang ipinakikita ng PNP. Dagdagan pa ang intelligence gathering para hindi makalusot ang mga teroristang magpapasabog ng bomba.</p>
<p></p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">

</ul>    </div>

      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

	jQuery(document).ready(function($) {

<div align="left" style="margin-bottom:20px;">

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

    <div id="main-menu" class="navigation">
    <div class="section clearfix">
      <h2 class="element-invisible">Main menu</h2><ul id="main-menu-links" class="links clearfix"><li class="menu-2130 first"><a href="/the-philippine-star">The Philippine Star</a></li>

  <div id="header" class="with-secondary-menu"><div class="section clearfix">

      <a href="/ngayon" title="Home" rel="home" id="logo">
        <div id="logo"></div>
      </a>
