          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Nursing stude dedo sa killer taxi                   </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698742" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/probinsiya/2017/05/11/1698742/nursing-stude-dedo-sa-killer-taxi" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Raymund%20Catindig/"> Ni Raymund Catindig</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/probinsiya/2017/05/11/1698742/nursing-stude-dedo-sa-killer-taxi" st_title="Nursing stude dedo sa killer taxi      @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/probinsiya/2017/05/11/1698742/nursing-stude-dedo-sa-killer-taxi" st_title="Nursing stude dedo sa killer taxi     " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/probinsiya/2017/05/11/1698742/nursing-stude-dedo-sa-killer-taxi" st_title="Nursing stude dedo sa killer taxi     " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/probinsiya/2017/05/11/1698742/nursing-stude-dedo-sa-killer-taxi" st_title="Nursing stude dedo sa killer taxi     " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/probinsiya/2017/05/11/1698742/nursing-stude-dedo-sa-killer-taxi" st_title="Nursing stude dedo sa killer taxi     " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>TUGUEGARAO CITY, Cagayan , Philippines <em>- </em>Patay ang 29-anyos na nursing student na Nigerian matapos itong masagasaan ng taxi sa kahabaan ng Lower Magsaysay Avenue sa Baguio City noong Martes ng hapon. Kinilala ang biktima na si Oreoluwa Tope, BS Nursing sa AMA, Baguio City at nanunuluyan sa Aurora Hill sa nasabing lungsod. Base sa police report na nakarating sa Camp Crame, hindi napansin ng driver ng Toyota Innova wagon taxi (AAA-1419) na minamaneho ni Julio Balangue, 67, ng Block 3 Middle Quirino Hill ang biglang pagtawid ng biktima. Tuluy-tuloy na nasalpok ang biktima na duguang napalupasay sa kalsada na sa kamalasan ay nakaladkad pa ng ilang metro ng taxi. Nabangga rin ng taxi ni Julio ang isa pang taxi ni Roy Lacaben. Nagawa namang maisugod ng Chairwoman si Debbie Banagui ang biktima sa Pines Doctors Hospital subalit idineklarang na patay.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>
  
      <div id="article-ad" class="region article-ad-region clearfix">
      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>

  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>

<div id="social-head">
	<ul style="float:left;">
		<li><div style="margin:3px 0 0;">Follow Us: </div></li>
		<li class="facebook spelement">
			<a href="https://www.facebook.com/philstarnews" target="_blank" data-bitly-type="bitly_hover_card"><img src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/fb-gray.png"></a>

}

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/boy-abunda.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698717" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Boy%20Abunda/SHOWBIZ%20NEWS%20NOW%20NA%21">SHOWBIZ NEWS NOW NA! Ni Boy Abunda</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>M</strong>asayang-masaya si <strong>Richard Gutierrez </strong>dahil muli siyang makagagawa ng pelikula sa <strong>Star Cinema. </strong>Matatandaang 2008 pa huling nagbida ang aktor kasama si <strong>KC Concepcion </strong>sa pelikulang <strong>For The First Time </strong>sa nasabing film outfit.</p>
<p>Makakasama ni Richard sa kauna-unahang pagkakataon si <strong>Angelica Panganiban </strong>sa bagong pelikula. Kabilang din si <strong>Angel Locsin </strong>sa malaking proyektong ito ng Star Cinema. <em>Im very excited with this project of course ang daming first. Like first time ko makakatrabaho si Angelica (Panganiban) and after ten years makakatrabaho ko si Angel dito sa Star Cinema. I consider this a new chapter, </em>nakangiting pahayag ni Richard.</p>
<p>Taong 2012 nang huling magkasama sina Angel at Angelica sa pelikulang <strong>One More Try </strong>kaya sobrang excited na rin ni Angel dahil muli niyang makakasama sa isang proyekto ang huli. <em>Im very excited na makakatrabaho ulit si Angelica after One More Try. Si Richard naman after ten years, sobrang na-miss ko siya katrabaho and exciting kung paano ulit kami sa mga eksena, yung mga nuances namin, kung paano namin tutulungan ang isat isa, </em>pahayag ni Angel.</p>
<p>Samantala, napapaisip na rin si Angelica kung ano ang kalalabasan ng unang pagtatambal nila ni Richard sa pelikula. <em>Bagong team up, kasama namin si Richard and first time naming magkatrabaho. Ibang-iba talaga, ibang flavor depende kung ano kalalabasan nito, </em>pagtatapos ni Angelica.</p>
<h2>
	Jodi kinakabahan kung kikita ang dear other self</h2>
<p>May bulung-bulungan na muli raw magtatambal sa isang proyekto sina <strong>Jodi Sta. Maria </strong>at <strong>Richard Yap. </strong>Nagsimulang sumikat ang tambalan ng dalawa sa teleseryeng <strong>Be Careful With My Heart </strong>na nagtapos noong 2014. <em>Basta ang masasabi ko, merong gagawing teleserye pero yun muna talaga ang masasabi ko. I dont want to confirm anything yet. Who wouldnt want to naman di ba? Nakatrabaho ko na siya before at wala namang problema, </em>makahulugang bungad ni Jodi.</p>
<p>Samantala, sa Miyerkules ay palabas na sa mga sinehan ang pelikulang <strong>Dear Other Self </strong>na pinagbibidahan nina Jodi, <strong>Joseph Marco, </strong>at <strong>Xian Lim. </strong>Napahanga raw si Jodi sa pagiging magaling na aktor nina Joseph at Xian at kung mabibigyan ng pagkakataon ay gusto muling makasama ng aktres ang dalawa. <em>Masaya, I love to work with Xian and Joseph. Siguro sa age lang naman nagkatalo pero when it comes naman to professionalism and dedication sa craft, hindi rin naman magpapahuli ang dalawang nakakabatang leading men ko, </em>pagbabahagi ni Jodi.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Aminado ang aktres na kinakabahan siya kung paano tatangkilikin ng mga tagahanga ang kanyang bagong pelikula. <em>In a way meron, pero mas iniisip ko na lang na we did our best pagdating sa pelikula. We did our best pagdating sa promotion. So bahala na si </em><strong><em>Lord</em></strong><em> don sa natitira pa, </em>giit ng aktres.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/lolit-solis.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698721" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Lolit%20Solis/TAKE%20IT%20TAKE%20IT">TAKE IT TAKE IT Ni Lolit Solis</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>B</strong>awal na bawal pala sa mga may sakit na Lupus ang sobrang tindi na sikat ng araw dahil makaaapekto ito sa karamdaman nila.</p>
<p>Nalaman ko ang impormasyon mula kay Diwa Party-List House Representative <strong>Emmeline Aglipay-Villar </strong>na isinusulong ang paggamit ng payong ng mga lupus patient.</p>
<p>Malawak ang kaalaman ng loving wife ni DPWH Secretary <strong>Mark Villar </strong>tungkol sa lupus dahil ganito rin ang sakit niya na natuklasan noong 2007.</p>
<h2>
	Rep. Em naiyaksa sorpresa ni Sec. Mark</h2>
<p>Kahapon ang 35<sup>th</sup> birthday ni Em at nag-celebrate siya sa piling ng Lupus Warriors na tinutulungan ng foundation na itinatag niya, ang <em>Hope for Lupus</em>.</p>
<p>Eksakto sa kaarawan ni Em ang World Lupus Day kaya malaking sorpresa sa kanya ang party na regalo ni Secretary Villar sa isang restaurant sa Quezon City.</p>
<p>Clueless na clueless si Em sa surprise birthday celebration dahil meeting ang pupuntahan nila ang sinabi sa kanya ni Papa Mark.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Walang-wala sa isip ni Em na nagtipun-tipon sa restaurant ang kanyang mga kaibigan, ang Lupus Warriors at si <strong>Emma Therese, </strong>ang one and only daughter nila ni Papa Mark.</p>
<p>Tiniyak ni Papa Mark na magiging unforgettable para sa misis niya ang surprise birthday party na maaga na nagsimula dahil bibiyahe pa sa ibang bansa ang DPWH Sec., kasama si President <strong>Rodrigo Duterte.</strong></p>
<p>Anim na araw na mawawala sa Pilipinas si Papa Mark dahil isinama siya ni Papa Rody sa pagbisita nito sa Cambodia, Hong Kong, at China.</p>
<p>Invited guests sa paggunita ng World Lupus Day ang former sexy stars na sina <strong>Patricia Javier </strong>at <strong>Ynez Veneracion.</strong></p>
<p>Si Papa <strong>Dioceldo Sy, </strong>ang businessman na may-ari ng <em>Everbilena</em> at <em>Blackwater Elite</em> basketball team ang nag-imbita kina Patricia at Ynez na parehong may sapat na knowledge tungkol sa Lupus. Nakita ko rin sa event ang nagtatangkaran na basketball players ng Blackwater Elite.</p>
<p>Si Em ang founder ng Hope for Lupus Foundation na pangunahing layunin na ma-educate ang mga Pilipino tungkol sa karamdaman na kumikitil ng maraming buhay kapag hindi naagapan.</p>
<p><em>Many people with lupus die because they were diagnosed when it was too late to do something about it, and more people die undiagnosed. If they had known the symptoms of lupus and received the proper treatment early on, their lives could have been saved,  </em>ang sabi ni Em.</p>
<h2>
	Lady Gaga kamuntikan na rin Mga singer suki ng Lupus</h2>
<p>Normal na normal ang hitsura ng mga lupus patient na bumati kahapon ng happy birthday kay Em.</p>
<p>Hindi mababakas sa mga mukha nila na nagdurusa sila sa lupus, isang chronic autoimmune disease. Kapag nagiging hyperactive ang immune system ng ating katawan, inaatake nitoang mga healthy at normal tissue na pinagsisimulan ng lupus.</p>
<p>Hindi nakakahawa ang lupus pero puwede ito na maging life threatening.</p>
<p>Si former President <strong>Ferdinand Marcos, </strong>ang American singers na si <strong>Selena Gomez, Seal, Toni Braxton, Paula Abdul, Nick Cannon, </strong>at <strong>Michael Jackson </strong>ang ilan sa mga sikat na personalidad na may lupus disease. Napabalita noon na may lupus si <strong>Lady Gaga </strong>pero nag-deny ito.</p>
<p><em>The truth is I dont show any signs, any symptoms of lupus but I have tested borderline for the disease, </em>ang denial ni Lady Gaga na umamin na may mga kamag-anak siya na may lupus disease.Napansin ko na mga singer ang karamihan sa mga nagdurusa sa lupus. Bakit kaya?</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Senators Kiko at Risa huling magka-holding hands?!                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698725" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698725/senators-kiko-risa-huling-magka-holding-hands" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//SEEN%20SCENE">SEEN SCENE</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698725/senators-kiko-risa-huling-magka-holding-hands" st_title="Senators Kiko at Risa huling magka-holding hands?!     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698725/senators-kiko-risa-huling-magka-holding-hands" st_title="Senators Kiko at Risa huling magka-holding hands?!    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698725/senators-kiko-risa-huling-magka-holding-hands" st_title="Senators Kiko at Risa huling magka-holding hands?!    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698725/senators-kiko-risa-huling-magka-holding-hands" st_title="Senators Kiko at Risa huling magka-holding hands?!    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698725/senators-kiko-risa-huling-magka-holding-hands" st_title="Senators Kiko at Risa huling magka-holding hands?!    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>S</strong><strong>een</strong>: Bumisita si <strong>Sandara Park</strong> sa opisina ng <strong>Viva Films</strong> dahil nag-courtesy call siya kay Boss <strong>Vic del Rosario</strong> bago siya bumalik sa South Korea noong Martes. Ang <strong>Viva Pictures International</strong> ang nag-release sa Pilipinas ng <strong>One Step</strong>, ang Korean movie ni Sandara na palabas sa mga sinehan mula kahapon.</p>
<p><strong>Scene: </strong>Ang suportahan ang <strong>Our Mighty Yaya</strong> ang public appeal ni <strong>Iza Calzado</strong>, ang lead actress ng <strong>Bliss</strong>. Magkasabay ang playdate ng Our Mighty Yaya at Bliss pero hindi karibal ang trato ni Iza sa pelikula ni <strong>AiAi delas Alas</strong>.</p>
<p><strong>Seen: </strong>Ngayon, May 11, ang magkasabay na kaarawan nina <strong>James Reid</strong> at <strong>Yassi Pressman</strong>. Twenty four years old na si James at 22 years old na si Yassi.</p>
<p><strong>Scene: </strong>Tama na, sobra na ang litanya ni <strong>Richard Reynoso</strong> laban sa paraan ng pag-awit ni <strong>Daniel Padilla</strong>. Masyado nang nag-e-enjoy si Richard sa mga libreng publicity kaya napagbibintang siya na use me in a sentence.</p>
<p><strong>Seen: </strong>Via caesarian section ang pagsisilang kahapon ni <strong>Gladys Reyes</strong> kay <strong>Gavin Cale</strong>, ang fourth child nila ni <strong>Christopher Roxas</strong>.</p>
<p><strong>Scene: </strong>Malakas kumain ang dating sexy star na si <strong>Ynez Veneracion</strong> pero ipinagmamaki niya ang mabilis na metabolism kaya size 25 pa rin ang kanyang waistline.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p><strong>Seen: </strong>Ang violent reactions sa appointment ni President <strong>Rodrigo Duterte</strong> kay <strong>Mocha Uson</strong> bilang assistant secretary ng Presidential Communications Operations Office (PCOO). Ang bagong posisyon ni Mocha sa Duterte administration ang headline news ng State of the Nation ng <strong>GMA News TV</strong> noong Martes.</p>
<p><strong>Scene: </strong>Affected much si <strong>Angeli Pangilinan</strong> sa kumalat na fake holding hands picture ng kanyang kapatid na si Senator <strong>Francis Pangilinan</strong> at ni Senator <strong>Risa Hontiveros</strong>.</p>
<p><em>This is below-the-belt cheap, </em>ang reaksyon ng asawa ni <strong>Gary Valenciano</strong> na hindi stranger sa mga showbiz intrigue.</p>
<p><strong>Seen: </strong>Ang banta ni <strong>Jobert Sucaldito</strong> na papangalanan niya ang television executive na nasa likod ng pagdedemanda sa kanya ni <strong>Erik Santos </strong>at ng talent manager na si <strong>Erickson Raymundo</strong>. Indefinite suspension with pay sa radio program niya ang parusa na ipinataw kay Jobert ng <strong>DZMM </strong>management. Hanggang December 2017 ang kontrata ni Jobert sa DZMM.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                US naglabas uli ng travel advisory                </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698756" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/11/1698756/us-naglabas-uli-ng-travel-advisory" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Joy%20Cantos/"> Ni Joy Cantos</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698756/us-naglabas-uli-ng-travel-advisory" st_title="US naglabas uli ng travel advisory   @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698756/us-naglabas-uli-ng-travel-advisory" st_title="US naglabas uli ng travel advisory  " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698756/us-naglabas-uli-ng-travel-advisory" st_title="US naglabas uli ng travel advisory  " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698756/us-naglabas-uli-ng-travel-advisory" st_title="US naglabas uli ng travel advisory  " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698756/us-naglabas-uli-ng-travel-advisory" st_title="US naglabas uli ng travel advisory  " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/lifestyle/travel-and-tourism/20140615/underground-river-palawan-2.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Ayon kay PNP Spokesman Chief Supt. Dionardo Carlos, patuloy ang kanilang pakikipagkoordinasyon sa US Embassy at iba pang kinatawan ng mga bansa sa Maynila kaugnay ng sinasabing banta ng terorismo sa Palawan na masusi pang bineberipika. <strong>File</strong></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><h2>
	PNP, AFP umalerto</h2>
<p>MANILA, Philippines - Nagpatupad na ng mas maigting pang security measures ang Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) at Philippine National Police (PNP)matapos magpalabas ng panibagong travel advisory ang Estados Unidos sa mamamayan nito na mag-ingat sa pagbiyahe sa Palawan dahil sa banta ng pambobomba at kidnapping.</p>
<p>Ayon kay PNP Spokesman Chief Supt. Dionardo Carlos, patuloy ang kanilang pakikipagkoordinasyon sa US Embassy at iba pang kinatawan ng mga bansa sa Maynila kaugnay ng sinasabing banta ng terorismo sa Palawan na masusi pang bineberipika.</p>
<p>Sinabi naman ni AFP Western Command Chief Lt. Gen. Raul Guerrero, pinaigting pa ng tropa ng militar ang ipinatutupad na security measures sa buong Palawan bunga ng travel advisory ng Estados Unidos.</p>
<p>Magugunita na bago maghasik ng karahasan sa Bohol ang mga bandidong Abu Sayyaf ay nagpalabas ng travel advisory ang Estados Unidos sa pagbiyahe sa Central Visayas partikular na sa Cebu.</p>
<p>Sinabi ni Guerrero na dahil sa panibagong advisory ng Amerika ay higit pa silang umalerto kung saan ay nagpulong ang PNP, AFP, at Philippine Coast Guard gayundin ang mga opisyal ng Palawan kasama ang mga pribadong sektor para sa pagpapaigting ng seguridad.</p>
<p>Ayon sa opisyal, hindi basta na lamang magpapalabas ng travel advisory ang US Embassy kung wala itong basehan dahil malawak ang intelligence network ng Estados Unidos.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Sinabi ni Guerrero na kabilang sa report na kanilang natanggap na kanilang bineberipika ay tatangkain umanong pumasok ng mga bandidong Abu Sayyaf sa Palawan kung saan target ng mga itong mangidnap sa Coron.</p>
<p>Those speedboats that they indicated in the report, we went and checked on them, but we saw that they are owned by people we knew, who are resort owners, ani Guerrero na sinabi pang negatibo ang nasabing report.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">Masthead, pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1</span><script language="javascript" src="http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/scripts/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script language="javascript" src="http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/scripts/masthead/masthead-all.1.1.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	//create element cycle
	philstarAdCycle_create("masthead-cont");
	(function($){
		//format eg: Nov 11, 2015 12:00 pm
		$('#masthead-cont').philstarAdCycle({
			1 : {  // ASEAN 2017

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Kelot, dedo sa poso negro                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698691" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698691/kelot-dedo-sa-poso-negro" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Mer%20Layson/"> Ni Mer Layson</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698691/kelot-dedo-sa-poso-negro" st_title="Kelot, dedo sa poso negro     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698691/kelot-dedo-sa-poso-negro" st_title="Kelot, dedo sa poso negro    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698691/kelot-dedo-sa-poso-negro" st_title="Kelot, dedo sa poso negro    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698691/kelot-dedo-sa-poso-negro" st_title="Kelot, dedo sa poso negro    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698691/kelot-dedo-sa-poso-negro" st_title="Kelot, dedo sa poso negro    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Isang lalaki ang patay nang mahirapang huminga at tulu-yang lumubog sa nililinis nilang poso negro habang inililigtas ang kanyang kasama-hang nahilo dahil sa mabahong amoy sa Brgy. Bagong Ilog, Pasig City nitong Martes ng gabi.</p>
<p>Nakilala ang nasawi na si Richard Cabarles, nasa hustong gulang, siphoning at plumbing helper ng Uniplus Plumbing.</p>
<p>Lumilitaw sa ulat ng Pasig City Police na dakong alas-8:00 ng gabi nang masawi ang biktima sa loob mismo ng nililinis nilang septic tank sa Manila Catering Corp. na matatagpuan sa Lakeview Drive, sa Brgy. Bagong Ilog.</p>
<p>Nauna rito, hinigop muna umano nina Cabarles at ng kanyang kasamahan na si Marvin Canbalon ang ibang laman ng septic tank, gamit ang kanilang plumbing equipment.</p>
<p>Sa ikalawang balik nila ay pareho na silang lumusong sa masikip at mabahong septic tank, na ang laman ay hanggang leeg pa pala nila.</p>
<p>Gayunman, habang nasa loob ng septic tank ay nakaramdam umano si Canbalon ng pagkahilo dahil sa sobrang baho sa loob kayat tinulungan siya ni Cabarles na makaahon.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Matapos namang maiahon si Cabanlon ay minalas na si Cabarles naman ang nahilo hanggang sa tuluyan itong nanghina at lumubog sa poso negro.</p>
<p>Mabilis namang humingi ng tulong sa mga awtoridad si Cabanlon ngunit patay na si Cabarles nang maiahon ng rescuers.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">

</ul>    </div>

      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">

	<ul style="float:left;">
		<li><div style="margin:3px 0 0;">Follow Us: </div></li>
		<li class="facebook spelement">
			<a href="https://www.facebook.com/philstarnews" target="_blank" data-bitly-type="bitly_hover_card"><img src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/fb-gray.png"></a>
			<script>(function(d, s, id) {
				var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
				if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
				js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
				js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#xfbml=1";
				fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
				}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
			</script>
			<div class="sp-wrap"><div class="sp-hover">
				<div class="fb-like-box" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/philstarnews" data-width="200" data-height="300" data-colorscheme="light" data-show-faces="true" data-header="true" data-stream="false" data-show-border="false"></div>
			</div></div>
		</li>

    background: url(/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/about-us-pm-logo.png) no-repeat 30px center;
    background-size: 6.5em;
}
.col-content.banat {
    background: url(/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/about-us-banat-logo.png) no-repeat left center;
    background-size: 11em;
}
.col-content.philstar {
    background: url(/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/logo-btm-homepage.png) no-repeat left center;
    background-size: 9.5em;
    margin-left: 50px;
}
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Higit 120 volunteers sasailalim  sa K-9 disaster response training                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698689" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698689/higit-120-volunteers-sasailalim-sa-k-9-disaster-response-training" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Lordeth%20B.%20Bonilla/"> Ni Lordeth B. Bonilla</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698689/higit-120-volunteers-sasailalim-sa-k-9-disaster-response-training" st_title="Higit 120 volunteers sasailalim  sa K-9 disaster response training     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698689/higit-120-volunteers-sasailalim-sa-k-9-disaster-response-training" st_title="Higit 120 volunteers sasailalim  sa K-9 disaster response training    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698689/higit-120-volunteers-sasailalim-sa-k-9-disaster-response-training" st_title="Higit 120 volunteers sasailalim  sa K-9 disaster response training    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698689/higit-120-volunteers-sasailalim-sa-k-9-disaster-response-training" st_title="Higit 120 volunteers sasailalim  sa K-9 disaster response training    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698689/higit-120-volunteers-sasailalim-sa-k-9-disaster-response-training" st_title="Higit 120 volunteers sasailalim  sa K-9 disaster response training    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Mahigit sa 120 volunteers ang sasailalim sa K-9 disaster response training ng Metropolitan Manila Development Authority (MMDA) bilang preparasyon sa posibleng pag-atake ng 7.2 magnitude na lindol sa Metro Manila.</p>
<p>Ayon kay MMDA officer-in-charge Tim Orbos,  hindi aniya sukat akalain na malaking bilang ng mga volunteers ang tumugon sa kanilang panawagan para sa naturang pagsasanay.</p>
<p>We never expected that the response to our call for volunteers for disaster situation would be this many, ani Orbos.</p>
<p>Nitong nakaraang Sabado ang mga volunteers kasama ang kanilang mga aso ay isinailalim sa orientation ni Mon Santiago, ng MMDA K-9 Search and Rescue Unit ng MMDA na nakabase sa Makati City para sa search at rescue units sakaling tumama ang malakas na lindol, na magreresulta sa pagguho ng mga matataas na gusali at structures.</p>
<p>Dahil sa malaking bilang ng mga volunteers na tumugon sa naturang pagsasanay,ang orientation ay hahatiin sa dalawang batches upang ma-accommodate ang mga tanong ng mga ito sa pagsasanay ng ibat ibang breed ng canine dogs, mula Belgian Malanois hanggang beagles.</p>
<p>Ngayong darating na Sabado ang MMDA K-9 Search and Rescue trainers ay sasanayin ang mga volunteers para sa mga basic search and rescue/retrieval operation naman.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>
  
      <div id="article-ad" class="region article-ad-region clearfix">
      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">

		margin-left: -106px;
		z-index: 500;
		width:210px;
		text-align:center;
	}
	.sp-hover{
		background-color: #FFFFFF;
		border: 1px solid #808080;
		padding: 5px;
	}
	.link-wrapper {
		position: relative;
		top: 33px;
	}
	.region.article-ad-region.clearfix.article-ad-box {
		width: 0;
	}
	#article-bottom #block-block-32 {
		margin-top: 10px;
		position: relative;
		top: 0;
	}
</style>

	jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
		$("#disqus-anchor").click(function(event) {
			event.preventDefault();
			$('html,body').animate({scrollTop:$(this.hash).offset().top}, 600);
		});
	});		
</script>

      <div id="footer" class="clearfix">
        <div class="region region-footer">
    <div id="block-boxes-footer-message-headlines" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-simple">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id='boxes-box-footer_message_headlines' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><style type="text/css">
/* footer */
#block-block-35 h2 {
    display: none;
}
.col-50 {
    float: left;
    width: 50%;
    position: relative;
}

	content: "";

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Uber driver, tugis sa karnap                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698693" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698693/uber-driver-tugis-sa-karnap" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Danilo%20Garcia/"> Ni Danilo Garcia</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698693/uber-driver-tugis-sa-karnap" st_title="Uber driver, tugis sa karnap     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698693/uber-driver-tugis-sa-karnap" st_title="Uber driver, tugis sa karnap    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698693/uber-driver-tugis-sa-karnap" st_title="Uber driver, tugis sa karnap    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698693/uber-driver-tugis-sa-karnap" st_title="Uber driver, tugis sa karnap    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698693/uber-driver-tugis-sa-karnap" st_title="Uber driver, tugis sa karnap    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Sinampahan ng kasong carnapping ng isang negos-yante ang kanyang kinuhang tsuper makaraang hindi na isoli sa kanya ang kanyang kotse na ipinampapasada sa ilalim ng Uber, kamakalawa sa Malabon City.</p>
<p>Inireklamo sa Valenzuela City Police- Anti-Carnapping Unit ni Katherine San Miguel, 34, ng Brgy. Panghulo, Malabon ang suspek na si Ariel Velitario, 46, ng Brgy. Palaan, Valenzuela City.</p>
<p>Sa salaysay ni San Miguel, kinuha niya si Velitario na tsuper para mamasada ng kanyang Toyota Vios na inirehistro niya sa Uber. Unang ipinasada ng suspek ang sasakyan noong Mayo 4 at nagkasundo sila na isosoli ang behikulo nitong Mayo 7.</p>
<p>Ngunit hindi na isinoli ni Velitario ang sasakyan at hindi na rin umano ito makontak ang suspek kaya sinampahan na ito ng biktima ng reklamo sa pulisya at ipinaalarma ang sasakyan.</p>
<p>Nagsagawa rin naman ng follow-up operation ang pulisya ngunit bigo rin na mahanap ang suspek at ang kotse.</p>
<p>Pinayuhan naman ng pulisya ang mga may-ari ng sasakyan na nais ipapasada sa ilalim ng mga uso ngayong car for hire applications na suriing mabuti ang pagkatao ng mga kukuning tsuper upang hindi maloko ng mga mapagsamantala.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>
  
      <div id="article-ad" class="region article-ad-region clearfix">
      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">

  <div class="content">
    <script type="text/javascript">

     rm_ad_obj = { zone_id : 834 };

<script type="text/javascript" src="http://cdn.revenuemantra.com/ads_v1.min.js"></script>


<style type="text/css">
		#social-head ul {
	  margin: 0;
	  padding: 0;
	}
	#social-head ul li a img:hover {
		opacity: 0.6;
	}
	#social-head li {
	  float: left;
	  height: 29px;
	  list-style-type: none;
	  list-style: none;
	  margin: 0 0 0 8px;
	  min-width: 20px;
	  position: relative;
	}
	.gplus-wrap {
		height: 284px;
		position: relative;
		width: 198px;
	}
	#___page_0 {
		left: -1px;
		position: relative;
		top: -1px;
	}
	#social-head li.spelement:hover .sp-wrap {
		opacity: 1;
		left: 50%;
	}
	.sp-wrap{
		background: url(http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/arrow-up.png) top center no-repeat;
		padding-top:9px;
		opacity: 0;
	    transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -moz-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -webkit-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    position: absolute;
		top: 20px;
		left: -2000px;

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Drug surrenderee, itinumba!                   </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698695" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698695/drug-surrenderee-itinumba" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Mer%20Layson/"> Ni Mer Layson</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698695/drug-surrenderee-itinumba" st_title="Drug surrenderee, itinumba!      @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698695/drug-surrenderee-itinumba" st_title="Drug surrenderee, itinumba!     " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698695/drug-surrenderee-itinumba" st_title="Drug surrenderee, itinumba!     " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698695/drug-surrenderee-itinumba" st_title="Drug surrenderee, itinumba!     " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698695/drug-surrenderee-itinumba" st_title="Drug surrenderee, itinumba!     " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Pinagbabaril at napatay ng tatlong hindi nakikilalang suspek ang isang 38-anyos na drug surrenderee, na hindi pa rin umano tumigil sa kanyang illegal na aktibidad, habang sakay ng isang pampasaherong tricycle sa Brgy. San Miguel, Pasig City, kahapon ng tanghali.</p>
<p>Nasawi noon din ang biktimang si Francisco Sioco Jr., alyas Jon-jon Bulok, may-asawa, residente ng 32 Dodge City, sa Brgy. Sagad, bunsod ng mga tama ng bala sa ibat ibang bahagi ng kanyang katawan.</p>
<p>Batay sa ulat ni SPO2 Romeo Taguilan, ng Pasig City Police, dakong alas-11:45 ng tanghali nang isagawa ng mga di kilalang suspek ang pagpatay sa biktima sa harapan ng Unified Bending System Company, sa Market Avenue, sa Brgy. San Miguel, Pasig City. Sakay umano ang biktima ng isang tricycle at nagpapahatid sa kanilang tahanan, nang mapahinto ang tricycle sa pulang stop light sa naturang lugar ay dito na nilapitan ng mga suspek ang biktima at saka pinagbabaril bago mabilis na tumakas patungo sa direksyon ng F. Legaspi Street.</p>
<p>Isinugod naman ang bikti- ma ng mga awtoridad sa Pasig City General Hospital pero hindi na ito umabot pang buhay.</p>
<p>Ayon sa mga awtoridad, posibleng may kinalaman sa illegal na droga ang pagpatay sa biktima dahil kilalang tulak at kabilang sa drug watchlist ng Pasig City Police.</p>
<p>Sumuko na rin umano ang biktima sa inilunsad na Oplan Tokhang sa kanilang barangay ngunit hindi naman tuluyang itinigil ang kanyang illegal drug activity, sa area ng Brgy. San Miguel at Brgy. Sagad.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Iniimbestigahan pa ng mga awtoridad ang krimen para sa agarang pagkadakip ng mga suspek.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                NPD nakipagdayalogo sa Muslim community                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698339" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698339/npd-nakipagdayalogo-sa-muslim-community" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Lordeth%20B.%20Bonilla/"> Ni Lordeth B. Bonilla</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 10, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698339/npd-nakipagdayalogo-sa-muslim-community" st_title="NPD nakipagdayalogo sa Muslim community    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698339/npd-nakipagdayalogo-sa-muslim-community" st_title="NPD nakipagdayalogo sa Muslim community   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698339/npd-nakipagdayalogo-sa-muslim-community" st_title="NPD nakipagdayalogo sa Muslim community   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698339/npd-nakipagdayalogo-sa-muslim-community" st_title="NPD nakipagdayalogo sa Muslim community   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698339/npd-nakipagdayalogo-sa-muslim-community" st_title="NPD nakipagdayalogo sa Muslim community   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Dahil sa magkasunod na pagsabog sa Quipao Maynila na ikinamatay ng dalawa katao at pagkasugat ng anim pa, nakipagdyalogo kahapon ang pamunuan ng Northern Police District (NPD) sa Muslim community at mga religious leaders.</p>
<p>Nasa 20 Muslim leaders mula sa Caloocan, Malabon, Navotas at Valenzuela cities (CAMANAVA) ang dumalo sa pulong na inorganisa ng NPDupang mas maging maganda ang kanilang relasyon at magtulungan sa pagmamantina ng peace and order dito.</p>
<p>Nilinawni NPD Director Chief Supt. Roberto Fajardo, ang kanilang pulong ay para sa preemptive measure upang maiwasan ang anumang karahasan tulad ng nangyaring magkasunod na pagsabog sa Quiapo, Maynila.</p>
<p>We want everyone to have a peaceful life. Ayaw naming sirain ang katahimikan sa inyong lugar kaya magtulungan tayo, ito ang pahayag ni Fajardo sa Muslim community.</p>
<p>Tiniyak naman ni Fajardo sa Muslim leaders at sa kanilang Imams, na poprotektahan ng hanay ng pulisya ang kanilang komunidad.</p>
<p>Tiniyak rin ng Muslim community sa pulisya, na handa silang tumulongsa kampanya nito kontra kriminalidad at terorismo.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/korina-sanchez.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Pulitika ang dahilan                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698785" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698785/pulitika-ang-dahilan" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Korina%20Sanchez/K%20KA%20LANG%3F">K KA LANG? Ni Korina Sanchez</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698785/pulitika-ang-dahilan" st_title="Pulitika ang dahilan     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698785/pulitika-ang-dahilan" st_title="Pulitika ang dahilan    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698785/pulitika-ang-dahilan" st_title="Pulitika ang dahilan    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698785/pulitika-ang-dahilan" st_title="Pulitika ang dahilan    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698785/pulitika-ang-dahilan" st_title="Pulitika ang dahilan    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>INAMIN ni Lt. Gen. Oscar Lactao, exercise director ng Pilipinas sa Balikatan 2017 na pulitika ang dahilan kung bakit ang focus ngayon ay humanitarian crisis, disaster response and counterterrorism at hindi depensa ng teritoryo at seguridad ng karagatan. Sa madaling salita, ayaw na namang galitin ang China, kung magsasanay para sa seguridad ng karagatan. Bakit nga ba sila magsasanay sa pagdepensa ng teritoryo at seguridad ng karagatan, kung China ang may-ari ng buong karagatan, na lubos-lubusang niyayakap na ni Pres. Rodrigo Duterte? Kung sila ang may-ari ng lahat, ano pa ang dedepensahan natin? Parang ganun ang pahiwatig.</p>
<p>Hindi na rin matutuloy ngayong taon ang Philippine Amphibious Landing Exercise (PHIBLEX) at Cooperation Afloat Readiness and Training (CARAT), kung saan kabalikat din sana ang mga Amerikano. Ganundin ang dahilan, ayaw na nga ni Duterte ng mga pagsasanay kabalikat ang mga Amerikano. Ang gusto niyang mangyari ay ang China ang maging kasama sa pagsasanay ng kani-kanilang militar. Hindi na rin malayo magkaroon ng mga pagsasanay kasama ang Russia. Hindi na malayo na ipawalambisa na rin ang EDCA, VFA at Mutual Defense treaty sa pagitan ng US at Pilipinas.</p>
<p>Ito na nga ang pagbabago. Nagpapalit na tayo ng mga kaalyado, dahil ito ang kagustuhan ni Duterte. Parang kabalintunaan naman na kung magiging kabalikat na natin ang China, bakit pa nila binabalaan at tinataboy ang mga eroplano at barko na lumalapit umano sa kanilang teritoryo? Kung magsasanay na ang ating mga sundalo kabalikat ang China, kailangan pa bang gawin ito? Paano kaya kapag napapag-usapan na naman ang pagsasaayos ng Pag-asa Island, na ayon sa opisyal ng China ay iligal daw? Sa tingin ko nga iyan ang hinihintay nang lahat, kung ano ang gagawin ng China kapag nagsimula na ang pagsasaayos ng Pag-asa. Kung matutuloy nga ang pagsasaayos, hindi ba? Baka kasi iba na rin ang ihip ng hangin. Baka pagbalik ni Duterte mula China, wala nang gagawin sa Pag-asa, o sa kahit ano pang hawak na isla ng Pilipinas.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

  tracker.set('dimension' + opts.dimensionIndex, !ad.clientHeight);
  document.body.removeChild(ad);
});ga("send", "pageview");ga('require', 'adblockTracker', {dimensionIndex: 1});
//--><!]]>
</script>
