  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Palaro_LeaderboardAd_728x90");
</script>  </div>
</div>
  </div>
        </div></div> <!-- /.section, /#leaderboard-top -->
        
        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Ladon, Maamo at Marcial magsasanay  para sa AIBA World Boxing Championship                </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698794" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698794/ladon-maamo-marcial-magsasanay-para-sa-aiba-world-boxing-championship" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Chris%20Co/"> Ni Chris Co</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698794/ladon-maamo-marcial-magsasanay-para-sa-aiba-world-boxing-championship" st_title="Ladon, Maamo at Marcial magsasanay  para sa AIBA World Boxing Championship   @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698794/ladon-maamo-marcial-magsasanay-para-sa-aiba-world-boxing-championship" st_title="Ladon, Maamo at Marcial magsasanay  para sa AIBA World Boxing Championship  " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698794/ladon-maamo-marcial-magsasanay-para-sa-aiba-world-boxing-championship" st_title="Ladon, Maamo at Marcial magsasanay  para sa AIBA World Boxing Championship  " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698794/ladon-maamo-marcial-magsasanay-para-sa-aiba-world-boxing-championship" st_title="Ladon, Maamo at Marcial magsasanay  para sa AIBA World Boxing Championship  " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698794/ladon-maamo-marcial-magsasanay-para-sa-aiba-world-boxing-championship" st_title="Ladon, Maamo at Marcial magsasanay  para sa AIBA World Boxing Championship  " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Tatlong Pinoy boxers ang daraan sa matinding pagsasanay bilang paghahanda sa pagsabak sa 2017 AIBA World Boxing Championships na gaganapin sa Agosto 25 hanggang Setyembre sa Hamburg, Germany.</p>
<p>Ang mga ito ay sina Olympian Rogen Ladon na sasabak sa mens light flyweight division (49-kg.), Dannel Maamo na hahataw sa mens flyweight category (52-kg.) at Southeast Asian Games gold medalist Eumir Felix Marcial na masisilayan sa mens middleweight class (75-kg.).</p>
<p>Nakasiguro ng awtomatikong tiket sa world meet sina Ladon at Maamo matapos makasungkit ng tansong medalya sa 29th Asian Continental Boxing Championships na ginanap sa Uzbekistan Sports Complex sa Tashkent, Uzbekistan.</p>
<p>Humirit din ng tiket sa AIBA World Championship si Marcial sa pamamagitan ng box-off kung saan tinalo nito ang Syrian boxer sa naturang Asian meet.</p>
<p>Sinasabihan ko lang sila na pagbutihan pa nila lalo ang pag-eensayo at lalo pang maging disiplinado sa lahat ng bagay para makuha ang inaasam nilang tagumpay, pahayag ni national pool coach Roel Velasco na bronze medalist sa 1992 Olympic Games sa Barcelona.</p>
<p>Noong 2015 edisyon ng world meet ay nag-uwi si Ladon ng tansong medalya kung saan tinalo niya sina Leandro Blanc ng Argentina sa first round (3-0), Joselito Velazquez ng Mexico sa second round (3-0) at Dawid Jagodzinski ng Poland sa quarterfinals (3-0).</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Subalit yumuko si Ladon kay Vasily Yegorov ng Russia sa semifinals sa pamamagitan ng 0-3 desisyon para magkasya sa ikatlong puwesto.</p>
<p>Nais ding makaresbak ni Marcial sa pagkakataong ito matapos matalo sa quarterfinals ng welterweight division sa parehong edisyon.</p>
<p>Magugunitang naitala ni Marcial ang technical knockout win laban kay Said Mohamed Walid ng Egypt sa first round kasunod ang 2-1 panalo laban kay Spaniard Youba Sissokho Ndiaye sa second round bago tumupi kay 2015 silver medalist Daniyar Yeleussinov ng Kazakhstan sa quarterfinals (0-3).</p>
<p>Sa kasaysayan ng AIBA World Championships ay wala pang gintong medalyang napapanalunan ang Pilipinas.</p>
<p>Tanging dalawang pilak at tatlong tanso lamang.</p>
<p>Naibulsa ni Velasco ang unang pilak noong 1997 sa Budapest, habang ang ikalawang pilak ay galing kay Harry Tanamor noong 2007 sa Chicago.</p>
<p>May dalawang tanso rin si Tanamor na nakamit niya noong 2001 sa Belfast at 2003 sa Bangkok.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<div id="block-views-balita-ngayon-block-3" class="block block-views">

    <h2><a href="/balita-ngayon" class="block-title-link">Balita Ngayon</a></h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="view view-balita-ngayon view-id-balita_ngayon view-display-id-block_3 breaking-news-list view-dom-id-a760ffceecc6c254c97dbcea17e4bf28">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-title">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1699010/dating-pba-player-dorian-pena-tiklo-sa-shabu">Dating PBA player Dorian Pea tiklo sa shabu</a></span>  </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Wizards, Celtics asam  ang 3-2 lead sa serye              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698788" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698788/wizards-celtics-asam-ang-3-2-lead-sa-serye" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698788/wizards-celtics-asam-ang-3-2-lead-sa-serye" st_title="Wizards, Celtics asam  ang 3-2 lead sa serye @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698788/wizards-celtics-asam-ang-3-2-lead-sa-serye" st_title="Wizards, Celtics asam  ang 3-2 lead sa serye" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698788/wizards-celtics-asam-ang-3-2-lead-sa-serye" st_title="Wizards, Celtics asam  ang 3-2 lead sa serye" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698788/wizards-celtics-asam-ang-3-2-lead-sa-serye" st_title="Wizards, Celtics asam  ang 3-2 lead sa serye" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698788/wizards-celtics-asam-ang-3-2-lead-sa-serye" st_title="Wizards, Celtics asam  ang 3-2 lead sa serye" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>BOSTON  Matapos ang dalawang sunod na panalo ng Celtics ay humataw din ng dalawang dikit na tagumpay ang Washington Wizards para maitabla sa 2-2 ang kanilang Eastern Conference semifinals series.</p>
<p>Nakatakdang pag-agawan ng Celtics at Wizards ang mahalagang 3-2 bentahe sa Game Five ngayon.</p>
<p>That's the playoffs for you, wika ni Celtics point guard Isaiah Thomas. We said it before the playoffs started, you lose a couple and you might get swept. I mean, that's what the world is gonna say. 'You're not good enough to be here,' or you win a couple and everybody loves you.</p>
<p>Alam na ng Washington kung paano patahimikin si Thomas.</p>
<p>Nalimitahan si Thomas sa 13 at 19 points sa Game Three at Four, ayon sa pagkakasunod.</p>
<p>Ito ay matapos siyang kumamada ng 53 points sa panalo ng Celtics sa Game Two.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>We have a lot of confidence, understanding that we had a chance to win all four games, wika ni Wall, nagtala ng 27 points at 12 assists sa kanilang panalo sa Game Four.</p>
<p>Even though we only won two, and they won two at their place, we had an opportunity to win those games even though we didn't shoot the ball well or we didn't play great defense, dagdag pa nito.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Batang Pier nagpatibay ng tsansa sa quarters                </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698790" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698790/batang-pier-nagpatibay-ng-tsansa-sa-quarters" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/RCadayona/"> Ni RCadayona</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698790/batang-pier-nagpatibay-ng-tsansa-sa-quarters" st_title="Batang Pier nagpatibay ng tsansa sa quarters   @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698790/batang-pier-nagpatibay-ng-tsansa-sa-quarters" st_title="Batang Pier nagpatibay ng tsansa sa quarters  " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698790/batang-pier-nagpatibay-ng-tsansa-sa-quarters" st_title="Batang Pier nagpatibay ng tsansa sa quarters  " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698790/batang-pier-nagpatibay-ng-tsansa-sa-quarters" st_title="Batang Pier nagpatibay ng tsansa sa quarters  " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1698790/batang-pier-nagpatibay-ng-tsansa-sa-quarters" st_title="Batang Pier nagpatibay ng tsansa sa quarters  " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/palaro/20170511/Alex-Stephenson.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Kinalawit ni Meralco import Alex Stepheson ang rebound.<strong> Kuha ni Miguel De Guzman</strong></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Sa kanilang pagpapahiram kay scoring guard Terrence Romeo sa Gilas Pilipinas para sa SEABA Mens Championships ay kinailangan ng Globalport ng isang kamador na import.</p>
<p>At napatunayan ito ni coach Franz Pumaren.</p>
<p>Kumolekta si import Justin Harper ng 30 points, 9 rebounds at 3 shotblocks para akayin ang Batang Pier sa 94-86 panalo laban sa Meralco Bolts sa 2017 PBA Commissioners Cup kagabi sa Mall of Asia Arena sa Pasay City.</p>
<p>A lot of people were asking why we changed import, and we needed a scoring import and one who will give us a new dimension in our game, sabi ni Pumaren sa paghugot nila kay Harper bilang kapalit ni Malcolm White.</p>
<p>Ang panalo ang nag-angat sa kartada ng Globalport sa 3-6.</p>
<p>Napigilan naman ang three-game winning run ng Meralco para sa kanilang 7-2 marka.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Nag-ambag si small forward Sean Anthony ng 18 markers at 8 boards para sa Batang Pier, habang tumipa sina Stanley Pringle at Mike Cortez ng 16 at 13 markers, ayon sa pagkakasunod.</p>
<p>Hindi nilubayan ng Globalport ang Meralco mula sa first period bago naiwanan sa pagtatapos ng third quarter, 61-65.</p>
<p>Nakatabla ang Batang Pier sa 81-81 patungo sa pagtatala ng 87-81 abante mula sa undergoal stab ni Cliff Hodge sa huling 2:32 minuto ng final canto.</p>
<p>Huling nakadikit ang Bolts sa 86-89 agwat mula sa dalawang free throws ni 2016 PBA Rookie of the Year Chris Newsome sa natitirang 55.1 segundo.</p>
<p>Ang basket ni Pringle ang naglayong muli sa Globalport sa 91-86.</p>
<p>Pinangunahan ni import Alex Stepheson ang Meralco sa kanyang 19 points, 26 rebounds at 3 shotblocks.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->


<!-- Start Teads TV Tags -->
<script type="text/javascript">
window._ttf = window._ttf || [];
_ttf.push({
       pid          : 33713 //DESKTOP
       ,lang        : "en"
       ,slot        : '.field-items .field-item > p'
       ,format      : "inread"
       ,mobile      : false
       ,minSlot     : 4
       ,components  : { mute: {delay :0}, skip: {delay :0} }
       ,mutable     : false
});
(function (d) {
        var js, s = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        js = d.createElement('script');
        js.async = true;
        js.src = '//cdn.teads.tv/media/format.js';
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(js, s);
})(window.document);
</script>

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/atty-ernest-maceda.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Magandang halimbawa                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698451" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-opinyon/2017/05/10/1698451/magandang-halimbawa" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Atty.%20Ernest%20Maceda/REPORT%20CARD">REPORT CARD Ni Atty. Ernest Maceda</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 10, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/10/1698451/magandang-halimbawa" st_title="Magandang halimbawa    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/10/1698451/magandang-halimbawa" st_title="Magandang halimbawa   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/10/1698451/magandang-halimbawa" st_title="Magandang halimbawa   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/10/1698451/magandang-halimbawa" st_title="Magandang halimbawa   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/10/1698451/magandang-halimbawa" st_title="Magandang halimbawa   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>SA lahat ng mga pamahalaang lokal sa Pilipinas, nangunguna ang mga mayayamang lungsod sa paghatid ng serbisyo sa mamamayan. Madali itong paniwalaan dahil malaki rin ang kanilang kinikita mula sa real property tax at business tax. Ikaw na ang maging highly urbanized city - siyempre, kung nasaan ang mga tao, naroon ang negosyo. Ganundin kung baliktarin. Susunod ang tao kung nasaan ang pagkakataong hatid ng negosyo.</p>
<p>Subalit hindi nangangahulugan na ang mayaman na lungsod ay ilalaan ang lahat ng kanilang kita sa paghatid ng serbisyo, lalo na ang serbisyong pantao. Sa larangang ito, ang lungsod ng Maynila ay hindi mauunahan ng iba. Tanging ang Maynila ang nakapagtatag ng anim na lokal na ospital at dalawang higanteng pamantasan para sa kanyang mamamayan.</p>
<p>Dati-rati ay kinilala ang Kamaynilaan bilang sentro ng health services dahil sa dami ng prestihiyosong ospital. Ito rin ang sentro ng edukasyon dala ng pag-usbong ng mga unibersidad. Subalit, dahil panay pribado ang mga institusyong ito, hindi naman ito abot kaya ng mga residente ng Maynila. Host nga sila, hindi naman magamit o mabiyayaan.</p>
<p>Dahil dito, nanguna ang Maynila sa pagtatag ng free hospitals at free universities para sa Manilenyo. Hambing sa ibang mga lokal na pamahalaan, iilan lang ang tulad ng Maynila na napakalaki ng budget na inilaan para sa health services at edukasyon ng kanyang mamamayan.</p>
<p>Sa ilalim ng pamunuan ni President Mayor Joseph Erap Estrada, patuloy na naibibigay ang benepisyong ito. At batay sa mga evaluation ng residente at mga resulta ng mga licensure exams, mataas ang kalidad ng serbisyo at ng edukasyon kahit pa libre ang mga ito.</p>
<p>Hindi rin nasasakripisyo ang ibang obligasyon ng pamamahala dahil kinikilala naman lagi ang Maynila sa pagiging top competitive city. Maganda itong halimbawa para sa lahat ng pamahalaang lokal.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

       ,slot        : '.field-items .field-item > p'
       ,format      : "inread"
       ,mobile      : false
       ,minSlot     : 4
       ,components  : { mute: {delay :0}, skip: {delay :0} }
       ,mutable     : false
});
(function (d) {
        var js, s = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        js = d.createElement('script');
        js.async = true;
        js.src = '//cdn.teads.tv/media/format.js';
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(js, s);
})(window.document);
</script>

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Iniwanan ng siyota  dahil may bad breath              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698005" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/dr.-love/2017/05/09/1698005/iniwanan-ng-siyota-dahil-may-bad-breath" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 9, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/09/1698005/iniwanan-ng-siyota-dahil-may-bad-breath" st_title="Iniwanan ng siyota  dahil may bad breath @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/09/1698005/iniwanan-ng-siyota-dahil-may-bad-breath" st_title="Iniwanan ng siyota  dahil may bad breath" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/09/1698005/iniwanan-ng-siyota-dahil-may-bad-breath" st_title="Iniwanan ng siyota  dahil may bad breath" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/09/1698005/iniwanan-ng-siyota-dahil-may-bad-breath" st_title="Iniwanan ng siyota  dahil may bad breath" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/09/1698005/iniwanan-ng-siyota-dahil-may-bad-breath" st_title="Iniwanan ng siyota  dahil may bad breath" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong><em>Dear Dr. Love,</em></strong></p>
<p><em>Unang-una ay bumabati muna ako sa inyo ng mapayapang araw.</em></p>
<p><em>Sana ay patuloy pang lumawak ang inyong kolum na Dr. Love.</em></p>
<p><em>Tawagin nyo na lang akong Jimboy, 24 anyos. Nagtataka ako kung bakit iniwanan ako ng girlfriend ko. Bigla na lang nakipag-break. Yun pala ay dahil sa aking masamang hininga o bad breath.</em></p>
<p><em>Wala naman akong bad breath noon. Bigla na lang noong dalawang buwan na ang nakararaan ay may nakakapansin na mabaho ang aking hininga.</em></p>
<p><em>Hindi ko po alam kung saan ito nanggaling.</em></p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p><em>Lima na pong ngipin ang pinapastahan ko noong Disyembre. Nagpalinis pa ako hanggang Marso.</em></p>
<p><em>Saka parang may basa sa aking lalamunan. Tungkol po kaya ito sa plema o sipon?</em></p>
<p><em>Ano po kaya ang pinakamagandang gawin? Saang doktor magandang magpatingin?</em></p>
<p><em>Tulungan po ninyo ako kung ano ang dapat na gawin.</em></p>
<p><em>Siyanga pala, pustiso po yung apat kong ngipin sa harap.</em></p>
<p><strong><em>Jimboy</em></strong></p>
<p>
	<strong>Dear Jimboy,</strong></p>
<p>Talagang malaking problema ang pagkakaroon ng ano mang masamang amoy sa katawan. Makabubuti kung sasangguni ka sa doctor na espesyalista sa Ear, Nose, Throat o ENT.</p>
<p>Kung maganda naman ang oral hygiene mo, walang dahilan kung bakit bumaho ang hininga mo. Sabi ng mga espesyalista, baka may internal problem.</p>
<p>Bukod sa pagsisipilyo ng ngipin, tatlong beses isang araw; makabubuting gumamit ka rin ng mga pangmumog na makapag-aalis ng bacteria sa bibig na siyang pinagmumulan ng pagbaho ng hininga. Kung hindi pa malunasan, talagang dapat ka nang sumangguni sa doctor. Madaling matuklasan sa pagsusuri kung ano ang pinagmumulan ng mabahong amoy sa bibig bukod sa pagkakaroon ng sirang ngipin.</p>
<p>Sana nakatulong nga ako sa iyo.</p>
<p><strong>Dr. Love</strong></p>
<p></p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

})(window.document);

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Mahirap ang lumimot              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1697302" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/dr.-love/2017/05/07/1697302/mahirap-ang-lumimot" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 7, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/07/1697302/mahirap-ang-lumimot" st_title="Mahirap ang lumimot @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/07/1697302/mahirap-ang-lumimot" st_title="Mahirap ang lumimot" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/07/1697302/mahirap-ang-lumimot" st_title="Mahirap ang lumimot" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/07/1697302/mahirap-ang-lumimot" st_title="Mahirap ang lumimot" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/dr.-love/2017/05/07/1697302/mahirap-ang-lumimot" st_title="Mahirap ang lumimot" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>Dear Dr. Love,</strong></p>
<p><em>Hi and Hello.</em></p>
<p><em>May I hide my true identity and please, itago nyo na lang ako sa alias na Morning Joy, 21 years-old. Ang suliranin ko ay tungkol sa isang guy. Tawagin nyo na lang siyang Marlon na nakasama ko sa trabaho pero hindi muna kami close. </em></p>
<p><em>Wala muna kaming pansinan sa umpisa until one day, habang pauwi ako galing sa trabaho, siya ang nagkusang lumapit sa akin at nakipagkilala. </em></p>
<p><em>From then on, naging magkaibigan kami. Naging malapit kami sa isat isa at hindi naglaon ay nanligaw siya sa akin.</em></p>
<p><em>Ngunit may nakapagsabi sa akin na taken na siya. Mayroon na raw kasintahan sa kanilang lalawigan. Tinanong ko siya at inamin naman niya. Siyempre nasaktan ako. Kasi, naramdaman ko na na-develop na ako sa kanya. Nagpasya na akong dumistansya sa kanya simula noon. Sa ngayon ay umuwi na siya sa kanilang probinsiya matapos ang kanyang kontrata sa trabaho. Ngunit bago siya umalis ay nagkausap kami at maayos siyang nagpaalam. Hindi ko maiwasan ang malungkot dahil minahal ko na rin siya.</em></p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p><em>Dr. Love, hanggang ngayon ay hindi ko pa rin siya nalilimutan. Ano po ang dapat kong gawin? Dapat ko ba siyang kalimutan na lang o patuloy na umasang siyay babalik?</em></p>
<p><em>Umaasa po ako na matutugunan ninyo ang aking problema. </em></p>
<p><strong><em>Morning Joy</em></strong></p>
<p></p>
<p><strong>Dear Morning Joy,</strong></p>
<p>Hindi ko alam ang kabuuan ng istorya ninyo. Pero nagkalinawan ba kayong mabuti? Wala pa naman siyang asawa at maliban na lang kung itinakda na ang kanilang kasal. Malaya pa siya para pumili ng babaeng pakakasalan.</p>
<p>Kung talagang may commitment na siya, dapat mo siyang kalimutan.</p>
<p>Huwag mong guluhin ang iyong isip at sikapin mong limutin siya. Kung talagang mahal ka niya, iiwan niya ang nobya niya sa probinsiya at babalikan ka.</p>
<p><strong><em>Dr. Love</em></strong></p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/lolit-solis.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698721" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Lolit%20Solis/TAKE%20IT%20TAKE%20IT">TAKE IT TAKE IT Ni Lolit Solis</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698721/misis-ni-sec.-villar-tuloy-ang-laban-sa-lupus" st_title="Misis ni Sec. Villar,  tuloy ang laban sa Lupus   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>B</strong>awal na bawal pala sa mga may sakit na Lupus ang sobrang tindi na sikat ng araw dahil makaaapekto ito sa karamdaman nila.</p>
<p>Nalaman ko ang impormasyon mula kay Diwa Party-List House Representative <strong>Emmeline Aglipay-Villar </strong>na isinusulong ang paggamit ng payong ng mga lupus patient.</p>
<p>Malawak ang kaalaman ng loving wife ni DPWH Secretary <strong>Mark Villar </strong>tungkol sa lupus dahil ganito rin ang sakit niya na natuklasan noong 2007.</p>
<h2>
	Rep. Em naiyaksa sorpresa ni Sec. Mark</h2>
<p>Kahapon ang 35<sup>th</sup> birthday ni Em at nag-celebrate siya sa piling ng Lupus Warriors na tinutulungan ng foundation na itinatag niya, ang <em>Hope for Lupus</em>.</p>
<p>Eksakto sa kaarawan ni Em ang World Lupus Day kaya malaking sorpresa sa kanya ang party na regalo ni Secretary Villar sa isang restaurant sa Quezon City.</p>
<p>Clueless na clueless si Em sa surprise birthday celebration dahil meeting ang pupuntahan nila ang sinabi sa kanya ni Papa Mark.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Walang-wala sa isip ni Em na nagtipun-tipon sa restaurant ang kanyang mga kaibigan, ang Lupus Warriors at si <strong>Emma Therese, </strong>ang one and only daughter nila ni Papa Mark.</p>
<p>Tiniyak ni Papa Mark na magiging unforgettable para sa misis niya ang surprise birthday party na maaga na nagsimula dahil bibiyahe pa sa ibang bansa ang DPWH Sec., kasama si President <strong>Rodrigo Duterte.</strong></p>
<p>Anim na araw na mawawala sa Pilipinas si Papa Mark dahil isinama siya ni Papa Rody sa pagbisita nito sa Cambodia, Hong Kong, at China.</p>
<p>Invited guests sa paggunita ng World Lupus Day ang former sexy stars na sina <strong>Patricia Javier </strong>at <strong>Ynez Veneracion.</strong></p>
<p>Si Papa <strong>Dioceldo Sy, </strong>ang businessman na may-ari ng <em>Everbilena</em> at <em>Blackwater Elite</em> basketball team ang nag-imbita kina Patricia at Ynez na parehong may sapat na knowledge tungkol sa Lupus. Nakita ko rin sa event ang nagtatangkaran na basketball players ng Blackwater Elite.</p>
<p>Si Em ang founder ng Hope for Lupus Foundation na pangunahing layunin na ma-educate ang mga Pilipino tungkol sa karamdaman na kumikitil ng maraming buhay kapag hindi naagapan.</p>
<p><em>Many people with lupus die because they were diagnosed when it was too late to do something about it, and more people die undiagnosed. If they had known the symptoms of lupus and received the proper treatment early on, their lives could have been saved,  </em>ang sabi ni Em.</p>
<h2>
	Lady Gaga kamuntikan na rin Mga singer suki ng Lupus</h2>
<p>Normal na normal ang hitsura ng mga lupus patient na bumati kahapon ng happy birthday kay Em.</p>
<p>Hindi mababakas sa mga mukha nila na nagdurusa sila sa lupus, isang chronic autoimmune disease. Kapag nagiging hyperactive ang immune system ng ating katawan, inaatake nitoang mga healthy at normal tissue na pinagsisimulan ng lupus.</p>
<p>Hindi nakakahawa ang lupus pero puwede ito na maging life threatening.</p>
<p>Si former President <strong>Ferdinand Marcos, </strong>ang American singers na si <strong>Selena Gomez, Seal, Toni Braxton, Paula Abdul, Nick Cannon, </strong>at <strong>Michael Jackson </strong>ang ilan sa mga sikat na personalidad na may lupus disease. Napabalita noon na may lupus si <strong>Lady Gaga </strong>pero nag-deny ito.</p>
<p><em>The truth is I dont show any signs, any symptoms of lupus but I have tested borderline for the disease, </em>ang denial ni Lady Gaga na umamin na may mga kamag-anak siya na may lupus disease.Napansin ko na mga singer ang karamihan sa mga nagdurusa sa lupus. Bakit kaya?</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

    <h2>More PSN Showbiz</h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="view view-related-content view-id-related_content view-display-id-block view-dom-id-660f0297b0516211a153f3cbdd3ecd6a">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

</div></form>  </div>
</div>

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/cristy-fermin.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Magkapatid na artista  ubod ng kuripot!                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698723" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698723/magkapatid-na-artista-ubod-ng-kuripot" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Cristy%20Fermin/UBOS">UBOS Ni Cristy Fermin</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698723/magkapatid-na-artista-ubod-ng-kuripot" st_title="Magkapatid na artista  ubod ng kuripot!    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698723/magkapatid-na-artista-ubod-ng-kuripot" st_title="Magkapatid na artista  ubod ng kuripot!   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698723/magkapatid-na-artista-ubod-ng-kuripot" st_title="Magkapatid na artista  ubod ng kuripot!   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698723/magkapatid-na-artista-ubod-ng-kuripot" st_title="Magkapatid na artista  ubod ng kuripot!   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698723/magkapatid-na-artista-ubod-ng-kuripot" st_title="Magkapatid na artista  ubod ng kuripot!   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Ay, maganda ang kuwentong ito tungkol sa isang pamilyang may zipper ang mga bulsa sa kakunatan. Pinagpipistahan ng mga beki ang kawalan na nga ng PR ng mga artista sa kanilang pamilya, pati ba naman ang kanilang mga magulang ay ganun din, nakakaloka nga ang tsikang ito.</p>
<p>Monologue ng aming source, <em>Nakipag-ex-deal ang mag-sister na yun sa isang shop. Regular silang nagpapa-manicure-pedicure, nagpapa-service sila sa house nila.</em></p>
<p><em>Papupuntahin nila ang manikyurista sa bahay nila nang gabi, pero dumarating sila sa bahay, sobrang late na, kaya antok na ang nail technician at ang manikyurista!</em></p>
<p><em>Mabuti sana kung habang naghihintay yung mga tao, e, may foodam man lang sila, pero waley! Nakatunganga lang sila habang naghihintay sa magkapatid.</em></p>
<p><em>Gabing-gabi na silang nakakapagsimula, may kaartehan pa ang mag-sister, marami silang ipinagagawang design sa mga nails nila. pagkatapos nilang dalawa, magpapalinis din ng kuko ang parents nila.</em></p>
<p><em>Pati ang road manager nila, nakikisali rin! So, natatapos silang gawin, madaling-araw na! Umaalis ang manikyurista at ang nail technician nang pagod na pagod, pero wala man lang tip mula sa family.</em></p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p><em>At ang nakakaloka pa, nilalakad nila ang palabas ng subdivision, malayo ang house nila sa main gate, napakadilim ng paligid. Nakakaloka, di ba naman? Wala na nga silang ibinibigay na tip, ni hindi man lang nila ipahatid sa driver nila ang mga pagod na pagod na pobre!</em></p>
<p><em>Ayaw na nga sana silang serbisan ng mga yun kundi lang sa pakiusap ng boss nila. Nakakahiya raw, kaya gora pa rin ang manikyurista at nail technician sa bahay nila!</em></p>
<p><em>Palaging ganun. Lunok-laway lang sila habang sineserbisan ang mag-sister at ang parents nila. Wala pa ring food, kahit softdrinks nga, e, wala! Nganga lang talaga sila!</em></p>
<p><em>At naku, habang nagpapalinis ng mga kuko nila ang magkapatid, kuwentuhan sila nang kuwentuhan tungkol sa mga kasamahan nilang artista! Ang dami-dami nilang kuda, kaya yun lang ang napapala sa kanila ng manikyurista at ng nail technician, puro pang-blind item ang naririnig nilang mga kuwento!</em></p>
<p><em>Sobrang kuring pala ang pamilyang yun! May zipper ang bulsa nila, palaging sarado! Ex-deal na nga, wala nang pay, wala pang kahit baryang tip ang mga gumagawa sa kanila?</em></p>
<p><em>Hay, naku! Nakakaloka talaga ang magkapatid na ito na palagi na ngang nakasimangot, e, wala pang ka-PR-PR! </em>napapailing na kuwento ng aming nalolokang source.</p>
<p>Ubos!</p>
<h2>
	Daniel sasabak na sa voice lesson</h2>
<p>May mga pangyayaring hindi kagandahan sa simula pero nagiging positibo ang resulta sa bandang huli. Pagkatapos lait-laitin si Daniel Padilla sa wala sa tono niyang pagkanta sa coronation night ng Bb. Pilipinas ay may magandang kuwentong ipinanganak tungkol sa sikat na young actor.</p>
<p>Ang mga negatibong pagpuna sa kanyang boses ay nagresulta sa pagkagising ng mga taong namamahala sa kanyang career. Ayon sa isang source na nakausap namin ay seseryosohin na ni DJ ang pagbo-voice lessons.</p>
<p><em>Kailangan niya naman talagang gawin yun, hindi siya dapat tamarin sa pag-eensayo. Hindi kasi siya nagbo-voice lessons, may nagga-guide lang sa recording niya, pero wala siyang regular voice lessons.</em></p>
<p><em>Hindi maganda ang nangyari, nasaktan siya sa mga comments sa social media, pero nagsilbing lesson sa kanya yun. Hindi siya dapat sumasalang sa malalaking venue nang hindi siya nakahanda.</em></p>
<p><em>Kailangang pinaghahandaan ang ganun. Kahit nga ang magagaling nang singers, e, bumibisita pa rin sa voice coach nila dahil gusto nilang ma-perfect ang pagkanta nila. Si Daniel pa ba naman ang hindi dapat gumawa ng ganun? </em>kuwento ng aming source.</p>
<p>At tanggap ni Daniel Padilla ang kanyang kakulangan, hindi naman nagmamaangas ang young actor, alam niya na para rin naman sa kanya ang mga komentong naglabasan sa wala sa tono niyang performance.</p>
<p>Sabi nga, paminsan-minsan ay kailangan din nating magkamali para meron tayong matutuhan, ano ba ang pinapansin? Di bat ang mga kulang at sobra lang naman?</p>
<p>Makagaganda para kay Daniel ang pagbo-voice lessons, singer-actor ang pagpapakete sa kanya, sa susunod ay siguradong magiging handa na siya sa mga malakihang pagtitipon.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

	#___page_0 {
		left: -1px;
		position: relative;
		top: -1px;
	}
	#social-head li.spelement:hover .sp-wrap {
		opacity: 1;
		left: 50%;
	}
	.sp-wrap{
		background: url(http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/arrow-up.png) top center no-repeat;
		padding-top:9px;
		opacity: 0;
	    transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -moz-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -webkit-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    position: absolute;
		top: 20px;
		left: -2000px;
		margin-left: -106px;
		z-index: 500;
		width:210px;
		text-align:center;
	}

		background-color: #FFFFFF;
		border: 1px solid #808080;
		padding: 5px;
	}
	.link-wrapper {
		position: relative;
		top: 33px;
	}

		width: 0;
	}
	#article-bottom #block-block-32 {
		margin-top: 10px;
		position: relative;
		top: 0;
	}
</style>

	jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
		$("#disqus-anchor").click(function(event) {
			event.preventDefault();

		});

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                4 hulidap cops, arestado ng PNP-CITF                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698681" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698681/4-hulidap-cops-arestado-ng-pnp-citf" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Joy%20Cantos%20at%20%20Lordeth%20Bonilla/"> Ni Joy Cantos at  Lordeth Bonilla</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698681/4-hulidap-cops-arestado-ng-pnp-citf" st_title="4 hulidap cops, arestado ng PNP-CITF    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>

<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698681/4-hulidap-cops-arestado-ng-pnp-citf" st_title="4 hulidap cops, arestado ng PNP-CITF   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698681/4-hulidap-cops-arestado-ng-pnp-citf" st_title="4 hulidap cops, arestado ng PNP-CITF   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698681/4-hulidap-cops-arestado-ng-pnp-citf" st_title="4 hulidap cops, arestado ng PNP-CITF   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><h2>
	Hepe ng Makati Police sibak sa command responsibility</h2>
<p>MANILA, Philippines - Apat na pulis na nakata-laga sa intelligence operatives ng Makati City Police ang inaresto ng mga tauhan ng PNP-Counter-Intelligence Task Force (PNP-CITF) matapos na masangkot sa robbery/extortion sa isang magkasintahan sa lungsod ng Pasay City.</p>
<p>Sa press briefing sa Camp Crame, iniharap ni CITF Commander P/Sr. Supt. Jose Chiquito Malayo sa mediamen ang apat na nasakoteng mga intelligence operatives ng Makati City Police na ayon dito ay inamin ang krimen.</p>
<p>Kinilala ang mga ito na sina PO2 Harley Garcera, PO2 Clarence Maynes, PO1 Tim Santos at PO1 Jeffrey Caniete. Ang mga ito ay inaresto matapos na ireklamo ng magkasintahang negos-yante na dinukot ng mga ito at kinokotongan ng P400,000 pero P100,000 ang naibigay sa mga scalawags na pulis.</p>
<p>Ayon kay Malayo, ang mga ito ay nasakote kamaka-lawa dakong alas-11 ng gabi sa isinagawang entrapment operation sa panulukan ng Merville Axis Road, Pasay City matapos na ireklamo ng magkasintahang negosyante na may-ari ng isang talyer na itinago ang mga pangalan para sa kanilang seguridad.</p>
<p>Ang magkasintahan ay puwersahan umanong dinukot ng mga suspect sa pag-aari ng mga itong talyer na matatagpuan sa kahabaan ng Kalayaan Road, Merville East Service Road, Pasay City noong Mayo 8 ng taong ito.</p>
<p>Ang mga ito ay pinaikut-ikot ng mga suspect sa loob ng behikulo sa may Pasong Tamo, Makati City na hiningan ng P400,000 pero P100,000 muna ang paunang naibigay ng magkasintahan na pinalaya sa pangakong ibibigay nila ang balanse kinabukasan (Mayo 9) at kung hindi ay nagbanta pa ang mga pulis na papatayin ang mga miyembro ng kanilang mga pamilya.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Dahil dito dumulog na sa PNP-CITF ang mga biktima kaya ikinasa ang entrapment operation na nagresulta sa kanilang pagkakaaresto.</p>
<p>Samantalang pinaghahanap naman ang apat pang kasabwat na tinukoy ni Malayo na dalawang pulis, isang sibilyan at isang retiradong opisyal ng PNP.</p>
<p>Kasabay nito, inianunsyo naman ni Chief Supt. Rene Aspera, hepe ng Directorate for Personnel and Records Management na ipinasibak na sa puwesto ni PNP Chief P/Director General Ronald Bato dela Rosa ang hepe ng Makati City Police na si Sr. Supt. Dionisio Bartolome at Chief Inspector Oscar Pagulayan, hepe ng Intelligence Division ng Makati City Police na immediate supervisor ng mga nasakoteng scalawags na parak.</p>
<p>The PNP Chief (P/Director General Ronald dela Rosa) is serious in internal cleansing, it may serve as an example sa iba pang mga commanding units to monitor and discipline their men, giit naman ni PNP Spokesman Chief Supt. Dionardo Carlos .</p>
<p>Samantala, naaresto rin ng PNP-CITF personnel si PO1 Efren Guitering ng Manila Police District (MPD) Station 6 sa isinagawang entrapment operation sa San Andres Bukid, Manila bandang alas- 5:15 ng hapon kamakalawa. Nabatid na off duty ang suspect nang arestuhin ang isang sibilyan sa umanoy anti-drug operation dakong alas-9 ng umaga nitong Martes na hiningan nito ng P 50,000 para hindi umano kasuhan sa korte.</p>
<p>Kasalukuyan na ngayong humihimas ng rehas na bakal sa PNP-CITF detention cell sa Camp Crame ang mga nasakoteng scalawags na parak na nahaharap sa kasong robbery/extortion at posibleng sampahan rin ng kidnapping ang apat na intelligence operatives ng Makati City Police.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

  <div class="content">
    <div id='boxes-box-ad_leaderbordtop_sabah' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><script language="javascript" src="http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/scripts/masthead/masthead-all.1.1.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<div style="position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px;text-align: center;">

			<script>
				//create element cycle
				philstarAdCycle_create("skinny-leaderboard-cycle");
				(function($){
					//format eg: Nov 11, 2015 12:00 pm
					console.log(window.location.pathname);					
					$('#skinny-leaderboard-cycle').philstarAdCycle({
						1 : { // ASEAN 2017
							photo : "http://www.philstar.com/embed/template/images/ads/masthead/20170425/skinny-asean-20170425.jpg",

						},
					});
				})(jQuery);
			</script>
		</div>

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                P418K, P1-M shabu iniwan sa taxi, isinuko ng driver                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698344" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698344/p418k-p1-m-shabu-iniwan-sa-taxi-isinuko-ng-driver" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Ricky%20T.%20Tulipat/"> Ni Ricky T. Tulipat</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 10, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698344/p418k-p1-m-shabu-iniwan-sa-taxi-isinuko-ng-driver" st_title="P418K, P1-M shabu iniwan sa taxi, isinuko ng driver    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698344/p418k-p1-m-shabu-iniwan-sa-taxi-isinuko-ng-driver" st_title="P418K, P1-M shabu iniwan sa taxi, isinuko ng driver   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698344/p418k-p1-m-shabu-iniwan-sa-taxi-isinuko-ng-driver" st_title="P418K, P1-M shabu iniwan sa taxi, isinuko ng driver   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698344/p418k-p1-m-shabu-iniwan-sa-taxi-isinuko-ng-driver" st_title="P418K, P1-M shabu iniwan sa taxi, isinuko ng driver   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698344/p418k-p1-m-shabu-iniwan-sa-taxi-isinuko-ng-driver" st_title="P418K, P1-M shabu iniwan sa taxi, isinuko ng driver   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Aabot sa P48,000 cash at nasa 50 sachet ng shabu na iniwan ng isang babaeng pasahero sa loob ng isang taxi ang isinuko ng driver nito sa Quezon City Police District (QCPD), kamakalawa ng hapon.</p>
<p>Ayon kay QCPD Director, P/Chief Supt. Guillermo Lorenzo T. Eleazar, ang driver na humiling na itago ang kanyang katauhan para sa proteksyon ng kanyang pamilya ay nasa edad na 50-anyos.</p>
<p>Nadiskubre ng nasabing driver ang items na nakasilid sa isang shoulder bag na iniwan ng kanyang babaeng pasahero noong nakaraang May 6, 2017 sa may EDSA malapit sa kanto ng N. Lawin Ave., Brgy. Philam, Quezon City at agad na isinuko ito sa Masambong Police Station (PS-2). </p>
<p>Nabatid kay Eleazar na nang naturang petsa ay nagsagawa ng anti drug operation ang PS-2 kung saan nadakip nila ang isang babae na kalaunan ay nakilalang si Felicidad Colis, 42, alyas Nanay, na nakaditine sa PS-2.</p>
<p>Si Colis, ay nadakip kasama ang kanyang live-in partner na si Ralph Anthony Roxas, 25, noongMay 6, 2017 sa EDSA sa Brgy. Philam habang tumatakas sakay ng isang taxi dakong alas-7 ng gabi.</p>
<p>Dito ay narekober kay Colis at Roxas ang mga sachet ng shabu. Pero nang dalhin sa PS-2 ay iniwan ng mga ito sa loob ng taxi ang bag para itago ang kontrabando pero kalaunan ay narekober din ng driver at ibinalik sa awtoridad.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Samantala, positibo ring kinilala ng driver si Colis na siyang nag-iwan ng naturang bag noong gabi ng isakay niya ito.</p>
<p>Bukod sa pera at droga na may timbang na 200 grams (P1,000,000.00 in street value), narekober din sa bag ang 10 mobile phones, 1 Acer tablet, 1 IPOD. </p>
<p>Sabi ni Eleazar, nagpapasalamat sila sa katapatan ng driver na hindi nasilaw sa malaking halaga ng pera, bagkus ay siya pa mismo ang gumawa ng paraan para hanapin at ituro ang nakaiwan nito.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

});

        js.async = true;
        js.src = '//cdn.teads.tv/media/format.js';

})(window.document);
