          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                26 bilanggo patay sa sakit sa mga siksikang selda                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1697065" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/06/1697065/26-bilanggo-patay-sa-sakit-sa-mga-siksikang-selda" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Lordeth%20B.%20Bonilla%20at%20Ludy%20Bermudo/"> Ni Lordeth B. Bonilla at Ludy Bermudo</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 6, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/06/1697065/26-bilanggo-patay-sa-sakit-sa-mga-siksikang-selda" st_title="26 bilanggo patay sa sakit sa mga siksikang selda    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/06/1697065/26-bilanggo-patay-sa-sakit-sa-mga-siksikang-selda" st_title="26 bilanggo patay sa sakit sa mga siksikang selda   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/06/1697065/26-bilanggo-patay-sa-sakit-sa-mga-siksikang-selda" st_title="26 bilanggo patay sa sakit sa mga siksikang selda   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/06/1697065/26-bilanggo-patay-sa-sakit-sa-mga-siksikang-selda" st_title="26 bilanggo patay sa sakit sa mga siksikang selda   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/06/1697065/26-bilanggo-patay-sa-sakit-sa-mga-siksikang-selda" st_title="26 bilanggo patay sa sakit sa mga siksikang selda   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/lifestyle/modern-living/20170506/PSN/METRO/26-bilanggo.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Ininspeksyon ni NCRPO director Oscatr Albayalde ang mga siksikang piitan sa Manila Police District (MPD) kung saan nga natuklasan na maraming mga bilanggo ang namamatay dahil sa ibat bang uri ng sakit dahil nga sa mga crowded na piitan. <strong>(Kuha ni Edd Gumban)</strong><br />
	</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Sa isinagawang inspeksyon kahapon ng National Ca-pital Regional Police Office (NCRPO) sa mga detention cell, nadiskubreng nasa 26 ng preso ang namataydahil sa ibat ibang sakit sanhi ng masikip na mga kulungan.</p>
<p>Ito ang nabatid ni NCRPO Chief Director Oscar Alba-yalde matapos magsagawa sila ng inspection sa ibat ibang detention facility sa Metro Manila kabilang ang area ng Southern Metro Manila at Manila Police District (MPD).</p>
<p>Lalu aniyang naging siksikan ang detention cell facilities sa Metro Manila dahil biglang lumobo ang bilang ng mga detainee dahil sa naging kampanya ng pamahalaan kontra droga.</p>
<p>Isa sanakikitang dahilan ng problema ay ang hindi agarang paglilipat ng mga ito sa kulungan sa Bureau of Jail Management and Penololgy(BJMP) hanggat walang court order.</p>
<p>Base sa record, nasa 18 preso na umano ang namatay sa area ng Taguig.</p>
<p>Sa inspection ni Albayalde Manila Police District (MPD) Integrated District Jail,iniulat ni MPD director, Chief Supt Joel Coronel,  sa nakalipas na anim na buwan ay 6 na preso na rin ang namatay sa kanila.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Kabilang aniya sa dahilan ng kamatayan ng mga ito ay dahil sa ibat ibang uri ng sakit tulad ngtuberculosis, cardiac arrest, blood infection at heart attack at poor hygiene na sanhi naman sa sobrang sikip ng mga kulungan sa Metro Manila.</p>
<p>Nabatid, na 15 preso ngayon sa MPD Integrated District Jail ang nangangailangan ng atensyong medikal kabilang ang isang 3-buwang buntis. Agad naman itong binisita ng mga tauhan ng Manila City Hall Health Office.</p>
<p>Nalaman din, na overcrowded ang naturang kulungan, na angkapasidad lamang nito ay nasa 100 na preso, subalit nasa 168 na ang nakakulong dito.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->


<!-- Start Teads TV Tags -->
<script type="text/javascript">
window._ttf = window._ttf || [];
_ttf.push({
       pid          : 33713 //DESKTOP
       ,lang        : "en"
       ,slot        : '.field-items .field-item > p'
       ,format      : "inread"
       ,mobile      : false
       ,minSlot     : 4
       ,components  : { mute: {delay :0}, skip: {delay :0} }
       ,mutable     : false
});
(function (d) {
        var js, s = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        js = d.createElement('script');
        js.async = true;
        js.src = '//cdn.teads.tv/media/format.js';
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(js, s);
})(window.document);
</script>

	}
</style>

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Bebot at lover patay sa live-in partner                   </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698682" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698682/bebot-lover-patay-sa-live-partner" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Ricky%20Tulipat/"> Ni Ricky Tulipat</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698682/bebot-lover-patay-sa-live-partner" st_title="Bebot at lover patay sa live-in partner      @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698682/bebot-lover-patay-sa-live-partner" st_title="Bebot at lover patay sa live-in partner     " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698682/bebot-lover-patay-sa-live-partner" st_title="Bebot at lover patay sa live-in partner     " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698682/bebot-lover-patay-sa-live-partner" st_title="Bebot at lover patay sa live-in partner     " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/11/1698682/bebot-lover-patay-sa-live-partner" st_title="Bebot at lover patay sa live-in partner     " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><h2>
	Naaktuhang nagtatalik</h2>
<p>MANILA, Philippines - Patay ang isang babaeng barangay volunteer at umanoy kanyang kalaguyo matapos silang pagsasaksakin nglive-in partner ng una makaraang maaktuhan sila ng huli na umanoy nagtatalik sa loob ng kanilang bahay sa Brgy. Commonwealth sa Quezon City, kahapon ng madaling araw.</p>
<p>Sa ulat ng Quezon City Police District-Criminal Investigation and Detection Unit (QCPD-CIDU), nakilala ang mga nasawi na sina Marilou Bulat-Ag, 41, at umanoy kanyang kalaguyo na si Junie P. Gulas Jr., 27, binata ng MRB compound Pilot Area, Brgy. Commonwealth QC.</p>
<p>Wala namang pagsisisi sa kanyang nagawa ang suspek na nakilalang si Bernard Tolitol, 58, magsasaka ng kusang sumuko sa awtoridad matapos ang insidente.</p>
<p>Base sa pagsisiyasat ni SPO1 Marvin Masangkay, may hawak ng kaso, nangyari ang insidente sa loob ng bahay nila Tolitol at Bulat-Ag sa nasabing barangay, dakong ala-1:00 ng madaling araw.</p>
<p>Lumilitaw sa imbestigasyon na ang suspek at si Bulat-Ag, ay 10 taon nang nagsasama at nabiyayaan ng dalawang anak.</p>
<p>Bago ang insidente, nitong nakaraang October 2016 ay umuwi sa kanilang probinsya sa Bumbon Northern Samar si Tolitol para magtanim ng palay at iniwan ang pamilya sa kanilang bahay.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Kahapon ng madaling araw, nang umuwi umano si Tolitol at sumilip sa bintana ay nakita niya ang kinakasama na nakikipagtalik umano sa isang lalaki na kalaunan ay nabatid na si Gulas.</p>
<p>Dahil dito, agad na kinatok ni Tolitol ang pinto at nang pagbuksan umano ang una ni Bulat-Ag ay bigla siyang inatake ni Gulas na may hawak ng gunting sabay suntok sa kanya at akmang sasaksakin kaya nagpambuno pa ang dalawa.</p>
<p>Nang makuha ni Tolitol ang gunting ay pinagsasaksak nito si Gulas sa buong katawan saka hinabol ang kanyang kinakasamang si Bulat-Ag at sinunod na pinagsasaksak na agad na ikinamatay ng dalawa.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>

      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>

#block-block-30 .sponsored-posts h2 {
	width: 612px;
	border-top: 1px solid #000;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
	color: #0C317F;
	font-weight: bold;
	padding: 5px 0;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}
#block-block-30 .sponsored-posts .item-list ul,
#block-block-30 .sponsored-posts .item-list ul li {	
	list-style: none;
	margin: 5px 13px 0 0;
	padding: 0;
}

	float: left;
	width: 195px;
}
#block-block-30 .sponsored-posts .item-list li a {
	color: #0071b3;
	font-size: 0.9em;
	font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
	font-weight: bold;
}
.sponsored-posts-img {
	width: 100%;
	height: 130px;
	margin: 0;
}
.outbrain-content {
    width: 612px;
    float: left;
}
</style>

	</div></div>  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                4 pulis Makati tiklo sa kidnap-extortion              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698604" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698604/4-pulis-makati-tiklo-sa-kidnap-extortion" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 10, 2017 - 1:28pm</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698604/4-pulis-makati-tiklo-sa-kidnap-extortion" st_title="4 pulis Makati tiklo sa kidnap-extortion @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698604/4-pulis-makati-tiklo-sa-kidnap-extortion" st_title="4 pulis Makati tiklo sa kidnap-extortion" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698604/4-pulis-makati-tiklo-sa-kidnap-extortion" st_title="4 pulis Makati tiklo sa kidnap-extortion" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698604/4-pulis-makati-tiklo-sa-kidnap-extortion" st_title="4 pulis Makati tiklo sa kidnap-extortion" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-metro/2017/05/10/1698604/4-pulis-makati-tiklo-sa-kidnap-extortion" st_title="4 pulis Makati tiklo sa kidnap-extortion" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/metro/20170710/makati-police-kidnap-extortion.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines  Apat na pulis ng Makati City ang nadakip sa isang entrapment operation sa Pasay City kagabi.</p>
<p>Nakilala ang mga suspek na sina PO2 Harley Garcera, PO2 Clarence Maynas, PO1 Tim Santos at PO1 Jeffrey Caete.</p>
<p>Nasakote ang mga suspek matapos magsumbong sa Counter-Intelligence Task Force ng PNP ang biktima na hindi pinangalanan ng mga awtoridad.</p>
<p>Ayon sa biktima, dinukot siya at ang kaniyang kasintahan ng mga hindi naka unipormeng pulis at pilit na isinakay sa isang itim na kotse.</p>
<p>Una silang hingian ng P400,000 kapalit ng kanilang kalayaan ngunit iginiit na wala silang ganoong kalaking pera.</p>
<p>Nauwi sa P250,000 ang tawaran at nakalaya ang mga biktima matapos makapagbayad ng P100,000.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Kahit na nakalaya na ay kailangan pa nila magbayad ng kulang na P150,000 upang maligtas ang kanilang pamilya na binantaang papatayin ng mga suspek.</p>
<p>Matapos makalaya ay humingi agad ng tulong sa CITF ang mga biktima na ipinlano ang operasyon.</p>
<p>Nakulong na ngayon sa Camp Crame ang mga suspek na nahaharap sa kasong administratibo at kriminal.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">

</ul>    </div>

		</li>

	<div class="col-50 left">
				<div class="col-content pilipino-star-ngayon">
					<h3>Pilipino STAR Ngayon</h3>
					<div class="sub-title">
						<a href="/pilipino-star-ngayon/about-us">About</a> | <a href="/pilipino-star-ngayon/contact-us">Contact</a> | <a href="http://edition.pagesuite-professional.co.uk/html5/reader/production/default.aspx?pubname=&pubid=7cc56e67-5c85-45ca-bbf9-5a2c9a9e17d2">Epaper</a></div>
					<div class="info">
						<p>202 Roberto Oca corner Railroad St, Port Area, Manila</p>
						<p>Tel. Nos. 527-2389, 527-7901</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>	
	<div class="col-50 right">
		<div class="col-content philstar">
			<h3>
				Philstar Global</h3>
			<div class="sub-title">

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                De Venecia itinalaga ni Duterte bilang special envoy              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698267" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/09/1698267/de-venecia-itinalaga-ni-duterte-bilang-special-envoy" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 9, 2017 - 1:58pm</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698267/de-venecia-itinalaga-ni-duterte-bilang-special-envoy" st_title="De Venecia itinalaga ni Duterte bilang special envoy @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698267/de-venecia-itinalaga-ni-duterte-bilang-special-envoy" st_title="De Venecia itinalaga ni Duterte bilang special envoy" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698267/de-venecia-itinalaga-ni-duterte-bilang-special-envoy" st_title="De Venecia itinalaga ni Duterte bilang special envoy" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698267/de-venecia-itinalaga-ni-duterte-bilang-special-envoy" st_title="De Venecia itinalaga ni Duterte bilang special envoy" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698267/de-venecia-itinalaga-ni-duterte-bilang-special-envoy" st_title="De Venecia itinalaga ni Duterte bilang special envoy" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/headlines/20170509/Former-House-Speaker-Jose-De-Venecia-as-Special-Envoy-for-Inter-Cultural-Dialogue.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines  Itinalaga ni Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte bilang Special Envoy for Inter-Cultural Dialogue si dating House Speaker Jose De Venecia, ayon sa Department of Foreign Affairs (DFA).</p>
<p>Sinabi ni DFA spokesperson Robespierre Bolivar na mula Abril hanggang Setyembre 2017 ang trabaho ni De Venecia na naging kinatawan ng lalawigan ng Pangasinan sa Kamara.</p>
<p>De Venecia will advise the government regarding inter-cultural dialogue issues to make recommendations to the [government] on how to advance [Philippine] interests as regards this issue," ayon sa DFA.</p>
<p>Nanilbihan bilang Speaker of the House of Representatives si De Venecia noong 1992 hanggang 1998 at 2001 hanggang 2008.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>

    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">

</script>

    background: url(/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/logo-btm-homepage.png) no-repeat left center;

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Leni itinangging ginamit ang pondo ng HUDCC, Pag-IBIG sa mga biyahe              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698279" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/09/1698279/leni-itinangging-ginamit-ang-pondo-ng-hudcc-pag-ibig-sa-mga-biyahe" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 9, 2017 - 3:54pm</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698279/leni-itinangging-ginamit-ang-pondo-ng-hudcc-pag-ibig-sa-mga-biyahe" st_title="Leni itinangging ginamit ang pondo ng HUDCC, Pag-IBIG sa mga biyahe @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698279/leni-itinangging-ginamit-ang-pondo-ng-hudcc-pag-ibig-sa-mga-biyahe" st_title="Leni itinangging ginamit ang pondo ng HUDCC, Pag-IBIG sa mga biyahe" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698279/leni-itinangging-ginamit-ang-pondo-ng-hudcc-pag-ibig-sa-mga-biyahe" st_title="Leni itinangging ginamit ang pondo ng HUDCC, Pag-IBIG sa mga biyahe" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698279/leni-itinangging-ginamit-ang-pondo-ng-hudcc-pag-ibig-sa-mga-biyahe" st_title="Leni itinangging ginamit ang pondo ng HUDCC, Pag-IBIG sa mga biyahe" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698279/leni-itinangging-ginamit-ang-pondo-ng-hudcc-pag-ibig-sa-mga-biyahe" st_title="Leni itinangging ginamit ang pondo ng HUDCC, Pag-IBIG sa mga biyahe" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/headlines/20170411/robredo-consul-new-york.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines  Pinabulaanan ni Bise Presidente Leni Robredo ang isyung ipinupukol sa kaniya na umanoy paggamit ng pondo ng Housing and Urban Development Coordinating Council at Pag-IBIG upang tustusan ang kaniyang mga biyahe.</p>
<p>Sinabi ni Robredo, na dating housing czar, na hindi totoo ang mga paratang at mapatutunayan ito sa pagtingin sa record ng HUDCC at Pag-IBIG.</p>
<p>Ayon sa kaniyang mga kritiko, bukod sa paggamit umano ng pondo ng opisina na nakatutok sa mga pabahay ay wala rin namang ginagawa si Robredo maliban sa pagpapa-picture.</p>
<p>Paliwanag pa ng bise presidente na bilang opisyal ng bansa ay maaari silang makakuha ng Travel Authority kung saan maaari mong ipasagot sa gobyerno ang gastusin ngunit hindi niya ito ginagawa.</p>
<p>Madali naman iyon i-check kasi ang Travel Authority ko nasa Malacaang. Lahat ng Travel Authority ko galing sa Malacaang, pahayag ni Robredo sa kaniyang panayam sa Unang Hirit ng GMA7.</p>
<p>At iyong mga past kong travels abroad, wala pa akong chinarge sa gobyerno. Iyong mga nag-is-sponsor ng mga travels, parati kong, pag ako naiimbitahan, parati kong tinatanong kung iyong nag-iimbita ba sasagutin iyong gastos, dagdag niya.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Isinama ni Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte si Robredo sa kaniyang gabinete ngunit kalaunay nagbitiw din ang bise president.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>
  
      <div id="article-ad" class="region article-ad-region clearfix">
      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");

<style type="text/css">
		#social-head ul {
	  margin: 0;
	  padding: 0;
	}
	#social-head ul li a img:hover {
		opacity: 0.6;
	}
	#social-head li {
	  float: left;
	  height: 29px;
	  list-style-type: none;
	  list-style: none;
	  margin: 0 0 0 8px;
	  min-width: 20px;
	  position: relative;
	}
	.gplus-wrap {
		height: 284px;
		position: relative;
		width: 198px;
	}
	#___page_0 {
		left: -1px;
		position: relative;
		top: -1px;
	}
	#social-head li.spelement:hover .sp-wrap {
		opacity: 1;
		left: 50%;
	}
	.sp-wrap{
		background: url(http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/arrow-up.png) top center no-repeat;
		padding-top:9px;
		opacity: 0;
	    transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -moz-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -webkit-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    position: absolute;
		top: 20px;
		left: -2000px;
		margin-left: -106px;
		z-index: 500;
		width:210px;
		text-align:center;
	}
	.sp-hover{
		background-color: #FFFFFF;
		border: 1px solid #808080;
		padding: 5px;
	}
	.link-wrapper {
		position: relative;
		top: 33px;
	}
	.region.article-ad-region.clearfix.article-ad-box {
		width: 0;
	}
	#article-bottom #block-block-32 {
		margin-top: 10px;
		position: relative;
		top: 0;
	}
</style>

	jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
		$("#disqus-anchor").click(function(event) {
			event.preventDefault();
			$('html,body').animate({scrollTop:$(this.hash).offset().top}, 600);
		});
	});

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Mocha Uson ginawang assistant secretary ng PCOO              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698300" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/09/1698300/mocha-uson-ginawang-assistant-secretary-ng-pcoo" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 9, 2017 - 7:00pm</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698300/mocha-uson-ginawang-assistant-secretary-ng-pcoo" st_title="Mocha Uson ginawang assistant secretary ng PCOO @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698300/mocha-uson-ginawang-assistant-secretary-ng-pcoo" st_title="Mocha Uson ginawang assistant secretary ng PCOO" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698300/mocha-uson-ginawang-assistant-secretary-ng-pcoo" st_title="Mocha Uson ginawang assistant secretary ng PCOO" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698300/mocha-uson-ginawang-assistant-secretary-ng-pcoo" st_title="Mocha Uson ginawang assistant secretary ng PCOO" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/09/1698300/mocha-uson-ginawang-assistant-secretary-ng-pcoo" st_title="Mocha Uson ginawang assistant secretary ng PCOO" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/lifestyle/young-star/20170106/PHILSTAR/Headlines/mocha.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines  Inilipat ni Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte ang taga-suportang si Margaux "Mocha" Uson sa Presidential Communications Operations Office (PCOO) mula sa Movie and Television Regulatory Classification Board (MTRCB).</p>
<p>Makakasama ni Uson sa PCOO ang pinuno nito at dating newsreader na si Martin Andanar.</p>
<p>Unang inilagay sa MTRCB si Uson nitong Enero bilang board member kung saan isinulong niya ang pagbabawal sa malalaswang eksena.</p>
<p>Makalipas ang isang buwan ay nagpahiwatig siya na magbibitiw sa pwesto kapag hindi niya nakumbinsi ang iba pang miyembro ng MTRCB na harangin ang malalaswang eksena sa telebisyon.</p>
<p>Hindi naman siya pinigilan ng Palasyo sa kaniyang plano.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>
  
      <div id="article-ad" class="region article-ad-region clearfix">
      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>
    </div>

  <div class="content">
    <div id='boxes-box-infomous_psn_showbiz' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><style>
.cnwidget.cnvw {
	border: 0px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important;
}
.cnwidget.cnvw .cnwidget-content {
	border-left: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important;
}
.cnwidget.cnvw .cnheader {
	background: url("http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/psn_default/images/widgets-background.jpg") !important;
    height: 51px !important;
    justify-content: center !important;
    margin-top: -28px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    vertical-align: middle !important;
}

	float: none !important;

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Pacquiao hindi minamaliit si Horn              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1697932" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-palaro/2017/05/08/1697932/pacquiao-hindi-minamaliit-si-horn" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 8, 2017 - 3:20pm</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/08/1697932/pacquiao-hindi-minamaliit-si-horn" st_title="Pacquiao hindi minamaliit si Horn @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/08/1697932/pacquiao-hindi-minamaliit-si-horn" st_title="Pacquiao hindi minamaliit si Horn" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/08/1697932/pacquiao-hindi-minamaliit-si-horn" st_title="Pacquiao hindi minamaliit si Horn" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/08/1697932/pacquiao-hindi-minamaliit-si-horn" st_title="Pacquiao hindi minamaliit si Horn" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-palaro/2017/05/08/1697932/pacquiao-hindi-minamaliit-si-horn" st_title="Pacquiao hindi minamaliit si Horn" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/sports/20161107/pac-vargas-raised-hands.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines  Magsisimula nang paghandaan ni Manny Pacquiao ang nakatakdang laban niya sa hindi lubos na kilalang si Jeff Horn.</p>
<p>Balik ensayo si Pacquiao matapos ang anim na buwan na pamamahinga ngayong Lunes sa Elorde Gym sa Pasay City.</p>
<p>Balik-ensayo, balik-boksing at siyempre excited na maka-amoy na naman gym, makapagsuot ng boxing glove, sumuntok sa heavy bag, double end at speed ball, wika ni Pacquiao ayon sa ulat ni Eddie Alinea ng PhilBoxing.com.</p>
<p>Dedepensahan ng 38-anyos na Pacquiao ang kaniyang WBO welterweight title sa mas batang si Horn ng Brisbane, Australia sa Hulyo 2.</p>
<p>Sa kabila ng kalamangan sa experience ng eight-division champion kumpara sa bagitong 29-anyos na si Horn ay tiniyak niya na gagawin niya ang lahat upang manalo.</p>
<p>Katunayan yan na Im not taking this fight lightly as some sectors think I am. At hindi ko rin ina-underestimate and kalaban ko, sabi ni Pacquiao.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Huling sumabak sa gitna ng ring si Pacquiao nitong Nobyembre 2016 kung saan inagawan niya ng titulo si Jessie Vargas.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Dating PBA player Dorian Pea tiklo sa shabu              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">

  <div class="content">

  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 7:46pm</span></div>

<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/sports/20170511/Dorian-Pena.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>

<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines  Himas-rehas ngayon ang dating PBA player Dorian Pea matapos masakote sa isang buy-bust operation.</p>
<p>Nadakip si Pea at dalawa pa niyang kasama sa Mandaluyong City.</p>
<p>Nakuhaan ng dalawang pakete ng shabu at drug paraphernalia ang mga suspek.</p>
<p>Isinailalim naman sa drug test ang tatlo at pawang mga ito ay nagpositibo sa paggamit ng ilegal na droga.</p>
<p>Huling naglaro si Pea sa GlobalPort Batang Pier.</p>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

</ul>    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Binay pinayagang makapag-pilgrimage sa Israel              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698953" class="node node-article node-promoted node-full node-full clearfix" about="/bansa/2017/05/11/1698953/binay-pinayagang-makapag-pilgrimage-sa-israel" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 5:02pm</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698953/binay-pinayagang-makapag-pilgrimage-sa-israel" st_title="Binay pinayagang makapag-pilgrimage sa Israel @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698953/binay-pinayagang-makapag-pilgrimage-sa-israel" st_title="Binay pinayagang makapag-pilgrimage sa Israel" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698953/binay-pinayagang-makapag-pilgrimage-sa-israel" st_title="Binay pinayagang makapag-pilgrimage sa Israel" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698953/binay-pinayagang-makapag-pilgrimage-sa-israel" st_title="Binay pinayagang makapag-pilgrimage sa Israel" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/bansa/2017/05/11/1698953/binay-pinayagang-makapag-pilgrimage-sa-israel" st_title="Binay pinayagang makapag-pilgrimage sa Israel" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/nation/20150803/jojo-binay-una-rally.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines  Pinayagan ng Sandiganbayan si dating Bise Presidente Jejomar Binay Sr. na makalipad patungong Israel para makapag-pilgrimage.</p>
<p>Sa pag-alis ni Binay ay kailangan niyang magbigay ng travel bond na P752,000, ayon sa Third Division ng korte.</p>
<p>Nakatakdang pumunta ng Israel si Binay sa Mayo 15 hanggang 29 kasama ang kaniyang misis na si dating Makati City Mayor Elenita Binay.</p>
<p>Inireklamo ang dating Bise Presidente dahil sa umanoy maanomalyang pagpapagawa ng Makati parking building na umabot sa P2.2 bilyon ang halaga.</p>
<p>Dawit din sa kaso ang kaniyang anak na nasipang Makati City Mayor Junjun Binay, habang ang babaeng Binay ay may kasong graft as Fifth Division dahil sapagbili ngP72 milyong halaga ngoffice furniture noong 1999.</p>
<div>
	</div>
<div>
	</div>
</div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>
  
      <div id="article-ad" class="region article-ad-region clearfix">
      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/boy-abunda.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698717" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Boy%20Abunda/SHOWBIZ%20NEWS%20NOW%20NA%21">SHOWBIZ NEWS NOW NA! Ni Boy Abunda</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698717/richard-excited-na-kina-angel-angelica" st_title="Richard excited na  kina Angel at Angelica    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>M</strong>asayang-masaya si <strong>Richard Gutierrez </strong>dahil muli siyang makagagawa ng pelikula sa <strong>Star Cinema. </strong>Matatandaang 2008 pa huling nagbida ang aktor kasama si <strong>KC Concepcion </strong>sa pelikulang <strong>For The First Time </strong>sa nasabing film outfit.</p>
<p>Makakasama ni Richard sa kauna-unahang pagkakataon si <strong>Angelica Panganiban </strong>sa bagong pelikula. Kabilang din si <strong>Angel Locsin </strong>sa malaking proyektong ito ng Star Cinema. <em>Im very excited with this project of course ang daming first. Like first time ko makakatrabaho si Angelica (Panganiban) and after ten years makakatrabaho ko si Angel dito sa Star Cinema. I consider this a new chapter, </em>nakangiting pahayag ni Richard.</p>
<p>Taong 2012 nang huling magkasama sina Angel at Angelica sa pelikulang <strong>One More Try </strong>kaya sobrang excited na rin ni Angel dahil muli niyang makakasama sa isang proyekto ang huli. <em>Im very excited na makakatrabaho ulit si Angelica after One More Try. Si Richard naman after ten years, sobrang na-miss ko siya katrabaho and exciting kung paano ulit kami sa mga eksena, yung mga nuances namin, kung paano namin tutulungan ang isat isa, </em>pahayag ni Angel.</p>
<p>Samantala, napapaisip na rin si Angelica kung ano ang kalalabasan ng unang pagtatambal nila ni Richard sa pelikula. <em>Bagong team up, kasama namin si Richard and first time naming magkatrabaho. Ibang-iba talaga, ibang flavor depende kung ano kalalabasan nito, </em>pagtatapos ni Angelica.</p>
<h2>
	Jodi kinakabahan kung kikita ang dear other self</h2>
<p>May bulung-bulungan na muli raw magtatambal sa isang proyekto sina <strong>Jodi Sta. Maria </strong>at <strong>Richard Yap. </strong>Nagsimulang sumikat ang tambalan ng dalawa sa teleseryeng <strong>Be Careful With My Heart </strong>na nagtapos noong 2014. <em>Basta ang masasabi ko, merong gagawing teleserye pero yun muna talaga ang masasabi ko. I dont want to confirm anything yet. Who wouldnt want to naman di ba? Nakatrabaho ko na siya before at wala namang problema, </em>makahulugang bungad ni Jodi.</p>
<p>Samantala, sa Miyerkules ay palabas na sa mga sinehan ang pelikulang <strong>Dear Other Self </strong>na pinagbibidahan nina Jodi, <strong>Joseph Marco, </strong>at <strong>Xian Lim. </strong>Napahanga raw si Jodi sa pagiging magaling na aktor nina Joseph at Xian at kung mabibigyan ng pagkakataon ay gusto muling makasama ng aktres ang dalawa. <em>Masaya, I love to work with Xian and Joseph. Siguro sa age lang naman nagkatalo pero when it comes naman to professionalism and dedication sa craft, hindi rin naman magpapahuli ang dalawang nakakabatang leading men ko, </em>pagbabahagi ni Jodi.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Aminado ang aktres na kinakabahan siya kung paano tatangkilikin ng mga tagahanga ang kanyang bagong pelikula. <em>In a way meron, pero mas iniisip ko na lang na we did our best pagdating sa pelikula. We did our best pagdating sa promotion. So bahala na si </em><strong><em>Lord</em></strong><em> don sa natitira pa, </em>giit ng aktres.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

})(window.document);

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/nitz-miralles.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Juday magluluto sa kasal ni Iza!                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698059" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698059/juday-magluluto-sa-kasal-ni-iza" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Nitz%20Miralles/ABOUT%20SHOWBIZ">ABOUT SHOWBIZ Ni Nitz Miralles</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 9, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698059/juday-magluluto-sa-kasal-ni-iza" st_title="Juday magluluto sa kasal ni Iza!     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698059/juday-magluluto-sa-kasal-ni-iza" st_title="Juday magluluto sa kasal ni Iza!    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698059/juday-magluluto-sa-kasal-ni-iza" st_title="Juday magluluto sa kasal ni Iza!    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698059/juday-magluluto-sa-kasal-ni-iza" st_title="Juday magluluto sa kasal ni Iza!    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698059/juday-magluluto-sa-kasal-ni-iza" st_title="Juday magluluto sa kasal ni Iza!    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/showbiz/20170509/Juday.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Judy Ann Santos</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>S</strong>imula na bukas ang showing ng <strong>Bliss </strong>na pinagbibidahan ni <strong>Iza Calzado </strong>sa direction ni <strong>Jerrold Tarog. </strong>Maganda ang review ng pelikula at Rated R-18 without cuts ng <strong>Movie and Television Review and Classification Board (MTRCB). </strong></p>
<p>Marami ang sumusuporta sa pelikula pati mga kaibigan ni Iza sa showbiz. Si <strong>Judy Ann Santos </strong>nga, kahit nasa Italy ay inayos ang pa-block screening nila para sa pelikula sa pagbabalik nila ni <strong>Ryan Agoncillo.</strong></p>
<p>Si Judy Ann din ang nangunguna sa pang-aalaska kay Iza na dapat sumunod na silang pakasal ni <strong>Ben Wintle </strong>sa April 28, 2018 dahil ito ang araw ng wedding anniversary nina Ryan at Judy Ann.</p>
<p>Sina Ryan at Judy Ann ang life peg ni Iza. Ang request pa nga ni Iza, magluto si Judy Ann sa wedding niya at pumayag naman ang kaibigan. Kaya lang, hindi pa nagpo-propose si Ben.</p>
<p>Iisa ang nagma-manage ng career nina Iza at Ryan, si <strong>Noel Ferrer</strong>.</p>
<p>Anyway, isa ang Bliss sa challenging movie na ginawa ni Iza at pinakamahirap na eksena sa kanya ay yung nakalutang siya sa tulong ng harness. Ang hirap daw dahil masakit sa katawan, pero ginawa niya ito nang walang reklamo.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Produced ng <strong><em>TBA Studios</em></strong> ang nasabing pelikula.</p>
<h2>
	Rocco at Lovi friends na uli</h2>
<p>Time out muna sa taping ng <strong>Encantadia </strong>sina <strong>Rocco Nacino </strong>at <strong>Sanya Lopez </strong>dahil lilipad sila papuntang Vancouver, Canada bukas sa imbitasyon ng Pinoy TV. First time lalabas ng bansa ni Sanya at siguro naman, kahit konting oras ay makapamasyal at makapag-bonding sila ni Rocco.</p>
<p>Sa May 14 ay kailangan nilang bumalik ng bansa para sa last taping ng Encantadia na magtatapos na sa May 19.</p>
<p>Pakikiligin nina Rocco at Sanya ang DanQuil fans sa Vancouver, pero nauna na nilang pinakilig ang fans nang pumunta sila sa Enchanted Kingdom para sa show ng cast ng Encantadia na sumubaybay sa fantaserye. Pinagbigyan nila ang request na kiss ng fans.</p>
<p>Samantala, totoong friends na uli sina Rocco at <strong>Lovi Poe. </strong>Hindi sinasadyang nabasa ng isang reporter ang text ni Lovi kay Rocco congratulating the actor sa pananalo ng gold medal sa sinalihang Jiu-Jitsu competition. Una noon, nag-text din si Lovi at nag-condolence sa pagkamatay ng lola ng aktor na nakilala ng aktres noong sila pa na nag-follow na uli sila sa isat isa sa social media.</p>
<p>In fact, open siya to work with Lovi again.</p>
<p><em>All is well, wala na akong pakialam sa love life niya. Hindi na ako affected. Ours was a good run. Were okay, pero close na kung tatanungin ako kung magkakabalikan pa kami, </em>sabi ni Rocco.</p>
<h2>
	Bianca walang paki kahit lumuwa ang boobs</h2>
<p>Childhood dream ni <strong>Bianca Umali </strong>ang mapasama sa <strong>Mulawin </strong>at sinubaybayan niya ang fantaserye noong bata pa siya. Favorite karakter niya si Alwina at natatandaan niya na umaakyat pa siya sa upuan at kunwari ay lilipad. Tuwing Halloween ay nagku-costume siya tulad ng mga karakter sa fantaserye.</p>
<p>Kaya laking tuwa ni Bianca nang malamang kasama siya sa cast ng <strong>Mulawin vs. Ravena </strong>bilang si Lawiswis o Wis. Dedma siya sa hirap ng training at sakit ng katawan pag hina-harness.</p>
<p>Kapag walang taping, nasa gym si Bianca at nagwu-workout o kayay nagti-training para sa fight scene niya. Hindi rin siya affected sa nagku-comment na kita ang cleavage niya sa kanyang costume.</p>
<p></p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<div class="content-wrapper clearfix">
		
	<div class="col-50 left">
				<div class="col-content pilipino-star-ngayon">
					<h3>Pilipino STAR Ngayon</h3>
					<div class="sub-title">
						<a href="/pilipino-star-ngayon/about-us">About</a> | <a href="/pilipino-star-ngayon/contact-us">Contact</a> | <a href="http://edition.pagesuite-professional.co.uk/html5/reader/production/default.aspx?pubname=&pubid=7cc56e67-5c85-45ca-bbf9-5a2c9a9e17d2">Epaper</a></div>
					<div class="info">
						<p>202 Roberto Oca corner Railroad St, Port Area, Manila</p>
						<p>Tel. Nos. 527-2389, 527-7901</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>	
	<div class="col-50 right">

				Philstar Global</h3>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->
