        <div class="wrapper clearfix">
          
          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Vhong isang buwan sa jeepney              </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698062" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698062/vhong-isang-buwan-sa-jeepney" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//"></a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 9, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698062/vhong-isang-buwan-sa-jeepney" st_title="Vhong isang buwan sa jeepney @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698062/vhong-isang-buwan-sa-jeepney" st_title="Vhong isang buwan sa jeepney" class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698062/vhong-isang-buwan-sa-jeepney" st_title="Vhong isang buwan sa jeepney" class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698062/vhong-isang-buwan-sa-jeepney" st_title="Vhong isang buwan sa jeepney" class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698062/vhong-isang-buwan-sa-jeepney" st_title="Vhong isang buwan sa jeepney" class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/showbiz/20170509/Vhong.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Vhong Navarro</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>MANILA, Philippines - Bibisita ang <strong>Its Showtime</strong> host at komedyanteng si <strong>Vhong Navarro</strong> sa <strong>Jeepney TV</strong> upang maghatid ng katatawanan bilang Icon of the Month ngayong Mayo.</p>
<p>Ipapakita ng <strong>Streetboys</strong> alumnus ang kanyang mga galaw sa <strong>BTS: Vhong Navarro,</strong> isang behind-the-scene documentary special, at sa <strong>JTV Star Showcase</strong>, isang entertainment special tungkol sa kanyang mga hindi malilimutang pagganap sa telebisyon. Siya rin ay bibida sa <strong>Sunday Hi-Way</strong> kasama ang mga nakakatawang pelikula na <strong>Da Possessed</strong> at <strong>Gagamboy</strong>.</p>
<p>Maliban sa ibat ibang karakter na ginampanan ni Vhong, magbabalik din ang iba pang mga hindi malilimutang karakter na sina Juan mula sa <strong>Juan dela Cruz</strong> ni Drama King <strong>Coco Martin</strong>, at Imang mula naman sa <strong>Kampanerang Kuba</strong> ni <strong>Anne Curtis.</strong></p>
<p>Sa Juan dela Cruz, si Juan ay isang ulilang lumaki sa kabaitan at paniniwala sa <strong>Diyos</strong>. Sa kanyang paglaki, sasali si Juan saKapatiran, isang grupo na ang misyon ay ubusin ang mgaAswang.Sa di kaalaman ni Juan, kalahati pala siyang aswang, anak ngHaring Aswang,at angAnak ng Dilimbase sa propesiya.</p>
<p>Samantala, si Imang ay isang Kampanerang Kuba na sinusubok sa buhay dahil sa pangungutya ng mga tao sa kanyang itsura. Kanyang matutuklasan ang totoo niyang mga magulang ngunit ang sakim niyang ama ay haharangan siyang makapiling ang kanyang tunay na pamilya.</p>
<p>Samahan si Vhong bilang Jeepney TV icon sa mga araw ng Linggo ngayong buwan ng Mayo sa Da Possessed na ipapalabas sa May 14, Gagamboy sa May 21 at sa BTS: Vhong Navarro sa May 28. Tunghayan naman ang Juan dela Cruz tuwing Sabado, 3PM, at ang Kampanerang Kuba tuwing Huwebes at Biyernes, 2:00pm.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p></p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>
  
      <div id="article-ad" class="region article-ad-region clearfix">
      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">

      <div id="article-bottom" class="region article-bottom-region clearfix">
      <div id="block-block-32" class="block block-block">

    
  <div class="content">
    <script type="text/javascript">

  <div class="content">
    <div id='boxes-box-infomous_psn_showbiz' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><style>
.cnwidget.cnvw {
	border: 0px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important;
}
.cnwidget.cnvw .cnwidget-content {
	border-left: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important;
}
.cnwidget.cnvw .cnheader {
	background: url("http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/psn_default/images/widgets-background.jpg") !important;
    height: 51px !important;
    justify-content: center !important;
    margin-top: -28px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    vertical-align: middle !important;
}
.cnwidget.cnvw .cnheader-title {
	float: none !important;
	color: #ffff00 !important;
    font-size: 1.5em !important;
	font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
    font-style: italic !important;
	line-height: 3em;
    text-transform: uppercase !important;
}

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/aster-amoyo.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Angel naunahan na  si Sarah kay Richard!                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698727" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698727/angel-naunahan-na-si-sarah-kay-richard" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Aster%20Amoyo/RATED%20A">RATED A Ni Aster Amoyo</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698727/angel-naunahan-na-si-sarah-kay-richard" st_title="Angel naunahan na  si Sarah kay Richard!     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698727/angel-naunahan-na-si-sarah-kay-richard" st_title="Angel naunahan na  si Sarah kay Richard!    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698727/angel-naunahan-na-si-sarah-kay-richard" st_title="Angel naunahan na  si Sarah kay Richard!    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698727/angel-naunahan-na-si-sarah-kay-richard" st_title="Angel naunahan na  si Sarah kay Richard!    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/11/1698727/angel-naunahan-na-si-sarah-kay-richard" st_title="Angel naunahan na  si Sarah kay Richard!    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>T</strong>aong 2014 pa nang huling gumawa ng pelikula ang twin brother ni <strong>Raymond </strong>na si <strong>Richard Gutierrez</strong> sa pamamagitan ng pelikulang <strong>Overtime </strong>na co-production ng <strong>GMA Films</strong> at <strong>Regal Films.</strong> Dito ay nakatambal ni Richard ang nakababatang kapatid ni <strong>Megan Young </strong>na si <strong>Lauren Young.</strong></p>
<p>In 2013, ginawa naman ni Richard ang <strong>My Lady Boss</strong> opposite <strong>Marian Rivera </strong>na co-production din ng GMA Films at <strong>Regal Films</strong></p>
<p>Huli namang napanood si Richard sa telebisyon noong isang taon nang gawin niya ang TV series na <strong>Ang Panday</strong> sa <strong>TV5.</strong></p>
<p>May nagbalita sa amin na may gagawing pelikula ang nakababatang kapatid ni <strong>Ruffa Gutierrez </strong>sa bakuran ng <strong>Viva Films </strong>opposite his ladylove na si <strong>Sarah Lahbati </strong>pero obviously mauunahan na ito ng balik-tambalan nina Richard at <strong>Angel Locsin </strong>kasama si<strong> Angelica Panganiban </strong>sa bakuran ng <strong>Star Cinema </strong>na nakatakdang idirek ni <strong>Nuel Naval.</strong></p>
<p>Sina Richard at Angel ay nagkatambal sa Valentine offering noon ng GMA Films at Regal Films, ang <strong>The Promise</strong> na idinirek ni <strong>Mike Tuviera </strong>in 2007. At that time ay <em>Kapuso </em>star pa si Angel. Nagtambal din ang dalawa sa <strong>Mulawin: The Movie</strong> in 2005.</p>
<p>Bago lumipat ng <em>Kapamilya </em>Network si Angel ay silang dalawa na ang Primetime King and Queen sa bakuran ng Kapuso Network kung saan nagsimula ang friendship nila.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<h2>
	Panday ni Coco inaabangan kung lulusot sa MMFF</h2>
<p>Kahapon, May 10 ay deadline ng submission ng Letter of Intent ng mga producer na gustong lumahok sa darating na <strong>2017 Metro Manila Film Festival (MMFF) </strong>na ang deadline naman ng pagsumite ng finished product ay sa Oktubre 30, 2017.</p>
<p>Ilan sa mga maagang nagsumite ay ang mga pelikulang <strong>Maruming Hangin</strong> na nakatakdang idirek ni <strong>Joel Lamangan</strong>, ang <strong>Citizen Jake</strong> na balik directorial job ni <strong>Mike de Leon</strong>, ang <strong>Ang Larawan, </strong>at ang <strong>Ang Panday</strong> na pagbibidahan at direksiyon ni <strong>Coco Martin </strong>at co-production niya with Star Cinema.</p>
<p>Sa mga submitted scripts, apat dito ang pipiliin at siguradong papasok sa Top 4 out of eight official entries na pipiliin habang ang natitirang apat ay ibabase na nila sa finished products or films. Ang walong official entries ay ia-announce on November 17.</p>
<p>Ang walong mapipili ay base pa rin sa Artistic Excellence (40%), Commercial Appeal (40%), Filipino Cultural and/or Historical Values (10%) at Global Appeal (10%.</p>
<p>Hindi rin ia-allow ang pagkakaroon ng dalawang entry (of same film genre) ang makakapasok sa walong official entries ganundin ang pagbibida at pagdidirek ng dalawang magkahiwalay na pelikula.</p>
<p>Inaasahan ng bagong bumubuo ng MMFF Execom Committee na mapapanatili pa rin ang artistic value ng mga pelikulang kalahok pero may commercial appeal para ma-achieve nila ang revenue noong 2015 na umabot ng mahigit isang bilyong piso.</p>
<h2>
	Denise itutuloy na ang naudlot na kasal sa fianc?!</h2>
<p>Marami ang naniniwala na nakabalikan ng Kapamilya singer-actress na si <strong>Denise Laurel </strong>ang kanyang ex-fianc, ang cager na si <strong>Sol Mercado </strong>na nagkataon pang very close sa kanyang anak na si <strong>Alejandro </strong>sa nauna niyang ex-boyfriend.</p>
<p>Si Denise ay napaka-effective sa mga kontrabida roles at kasama na rito ang sinusubaybayang panghapong serye ng Dos, ang <strong>The Better Half</strong> kung saan niya kabituin sina <strong>Shaina Magdayao, Carlo Aquino, </strong>at <strong>JC de Vera.</strong></p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>

    <h2><a href="/balita-ngayon" class="block-title-link">Balita Ngayon</a></h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="view view-balita-ngayon view-id-balita_ngayon view-display-id-block_3 breaking-news-list view-dom-id-1e3fcc2871fe57d67e9a4ffbdf85127e">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-title">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/psn-palaro/2017/05/11/1699010/dating-pba-player-dorian-pena-tiklo-sa-shabu">Dating PBA player Dorian Pea tiklo sa shabu</a></span>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-publication-date">        <div class="field-content"><span class="date-display-single" property="dc:date" datatype="xsd:dateTime" content="2017-05-11T19:46:00+08:00">May 11, 2017 - 7:46pm</span></div>  </div></li>

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/salve-v-asis.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Julia at Joshua todo halikan  at lambingan sa bora?!               </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1697218" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/06/1697218/julia-joshua-todo-halikan-lambingan-sa-bora" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Salve%20V.%20Asis/"> Ni Salve V. Asis</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 6, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/06/1697218/julia-joshua-todo-halikan-lambingan-sa-bora" st_title="Julia at Joshua todo halikan  at lambingan sa bora?!  @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/06/1697218/julia-joshua-todo-halikan-lambingan-sa-bora" st_title="Julia at Joshua todo halikan  at lambingan sa bora?! " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/06/1697218/julia-joshua-todo-halikan-lambingan-sa-bora" st_title="Julia at Joshua todo halikan  at lambingan sa bora?! " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/06/1697218/julia-joshua-todo-halikan-lambingan-sa-bora" st_title="Julia at Joshua todo halikan  at lambingan sa bora?! " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/06/1697218/julia-joshua-todo-halikan-lambingan-sa-bora" st_title="Julia at Joshua todo halikan  at lambingan sa bora?! " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/lifestyle/modern-living/20170506/PSN/SHOWBIZ/julia-joshua.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Julia Barretto at Joshua Garcia</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Uy todo raw ang lambingan at halikan ng magka-loveteam na sina <strong>Julia Barretto</strong> at <strong>Joshua Garcia</strong> sa Boracay recently.</p>
<p>Marami raw nakakita sa ginagawa ng dalawa pero dedma-dedmahan lang.</p>
<p>Parang hindi na lang umano basta loveteam ang dalawa dahil sa mga kilos nila.</p>
<p>Eh kasama pa raw that time ng grupo ang kapatid ni Julia na si <strong>Dani</strong> na wa naman pakialam.</p>
<p>Pumatok ang loveteam nila sa <strong>Vince &amp; Kath &amp; James</strong> at ngayon nga ay gagawan sila ng launching movie. Or baka naman para sa promo yun?</p>
<div style="width:600px; background-color:#DDDDDD; color:#676767;clear:both; margin-bottom:20px">
	<img alt="" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/the-philippine-star/lifestyle/modern-living/20170506/PSN/SHOWBIZ/xian.jpg" style="height: 400px; width: 600px;" /><p style="text-align:left; padding:10px; margin-bottom:8px">Xian Lim, Jodi Sta. Maria at Joseph Marco</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

</div>
<p>Pagiging childlike ni Xian, nadiskubre ni Jodi</p>
<p>Kahit may anak na, pasok pa sa category ng millennial si <strong>Jodi Sta. Maria</strong> na role niya sa pelikulang <strong>Dear Other Self</strong> with <strong>Xian Lim</strong> and <strong>Joseph Marco</strong>.</p>
<p>Sinasabing kabilang sa grupo ng millennial ang mga ipinanganak from 1980 to 1995 at technically, pasok siya sa category na yun ayon kay Jodi kahit nagbida siya sa throwback show na <strong>Tabing Ilog</strong>.</p>
<p>Kaya naman, relate agad siya sa kanyang dalawang leading man kahit na nga nauna siyang naitambal sa mga mature leading men  <strong>Richard Yap</strong> and <strong>Ian Veneracion</strong>.</p>
<p>Blessing pa nga raw niyang tinuturing ang dalawang millennial actors dahil hindi sila naging pahirap sa shooting.</p>
<p>Besides, hindi na raw niya maituturing na mga bata sina Xian and Joseph. <em>Kasi pag sinabi mong bata, parang child star, dun papunta.</em></p>
<p><em>Pero hindi ko talaga kasi ma-consider na parang mga bata. Though sa age, oo, mas bata sila sa akin. Pero I think, yung level of maturity naman nitong dalawang lalaking ito ay hindi naman nalalayo sa akin. Yun lang siguro ang masasabi ko, </em>ang paliwanag ng actress na nababalitang hiwalay na kay Cavite Vice Gov. <strong>Jolo Revilla</strong>.</p>
<p>Though sinabi ni Jodi na may pagka-childlike si Xian.</p>
<p><em>Parang he enjoys his life, he enjoys the world he lives in, he enjoys the moment and yun yung magandang nakikita ko sa kanya. Hindi siya childish pero childlike. Theres a sense of awe and enchantment don sa mga bagay na ginagawa niya,</em> ang sagot ni Jodi nang matanong kung kumusta namang katrabaho ang actor.</p>
<p>Eh si Joseph, paano namang katrabaho?</p>
<p><em>It was fun working with him, nakakatuwa because isa siyang tao na talagang sineseryoso niya yung trabaho niya. Nakakatuwa na dumarating talaga siya sa set ng prepared and talagang inaaral niya ang mga eksena niya. And nakakatuwa don sa mga mas nakababatang artista na ganun yung attitude nila pagdating sa trabaho,</em> ang paglalarawan niya.</p>
<p>Ang sabi, pelikula talaga ni Jodi ang Dear Other Self at support lang ang dalawang actor.</p>
<p>Ang Dear Other Self ay isang pelikula tungkol sa mga desisyon sa buhay ng isang hindi kabataang babae at ang kanyang makulay na paglalakbay sa kanyang paghahanap ng tunay at pangmatagalang kaligayahan.</p>
<p>Dinirek ito ni <strong>Veronica Velasco</strong>, ang The Other Self ay palabas na sa mga sinehan sa May 17 para sa <strong>Star Cinema</strong>. </p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

    <h2>More PSN Showbiz</h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="view view-related-content view-id-related_content view-display-id-block view-dom-id-95a4a3e4c38f7a3fd84dc376aacba9c3">

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/veronica-r-samio.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Monching hindi nagpaplanong  pakasalan si Tina Paner!                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1695245" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/04/30/1695245/monching-hindi-nagpaplanong-pakasalan-si-tina-paner" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Veronica%20R.%20Samio/SANGA-SANGANDILA">SANGA-SANGANDILA Ni Veronica R. Samio</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated April 30, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/04/30/1695245/monching-hindi-nagpaplanong-pakasalan-si-tina-paner" st_title="Monching hindi nagpaplanong  pakasalan si Tina Paner!    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/04/30/1695245/monching-hindi-nagpaplanong-pakasalan-si-tina-paner" st_title="Monching hindi nagpaplanong  pakasalan si Tina Paner!   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/04/30/1695245/monching-hindi-nagpaplanong-pakasalan-si-tina-paner" st_title="Monching hindi nagpaplanong  pakasalan si Tina Paner!   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/04/30/1695245/monching-hindi-nagpaplanong-pakasalan-si-tina-paner" st_title="Monching hindi nagpaplanong  pakasalan si Tina Paner!   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/04/30/1695245/monching-hindi-nagpaplanong-pakasalan-si-tina-paner" st_title="Monching hindi nagpaplanong  pakasalan si Tina Paner!   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/showbiz/20170430/Tima.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Tina Paner</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>H</strong>indi lang si<strong>Lotlot de Leon</strong>ang nakakita ng bagong glorya sa pag-ibig, pati rin ang ama ng apat niyang anak na si<strong>Ramon Christopher Monching Gutierrez.</strong>Hindi naman naging mahirap makahanap si Lotlot ng makakarelasyon matapos sumemplang ang marriage nila ni Ramon. Hindi naman masasabi na hindi sila nag-try na i-save ito. Katunayan inabot pa sila ng kanilang ika-apat na anak bago sila magpasyang maghiwalay. Annulled na ang marriage nila, pero civil sila para sa kapakanan ng mga bata na sa kanilang ama napiling pumisan.</p>
<p>Malalaki na ang mga anak nila. Si <strong>Janine Gutierrez</strong>na matapos maka-graduate ng kolehiyo ay nagpasya ring sundan ang trabaho ng kanyang mga magulang at pasukin ang mundong kanyang kinalakihan.</p>
<p>Hindi naman napabayaan ng dating mag-asawa ang kanilang mga anak. Ngayon naman ay tatangkain nilang bumuo ng sariling buhay.Apat na taon nang may karelasyong Lebanese si Lotlot, pero ngayon lamang siya nag-iisip na magpakasal at gawing legal ang kanilang pagsasama.</p>
<p>Wala man sa agenda ni Monching ang muling pag-aasawa dahil bago pa ang relasyon nila ng isa nilang dating kasamahan ni Lotlot sa<strong>Thats Entertainment </strong>na si<strong>Tina Paner.</strong>Pero malay nyo baka sa pagpapakasal ni Lotlot ay mabigyan din ng inspirasyon si Monching na muling sumugal sa marriage. Anulled na rin si Tina at may isang anak na babae.</p>
<h2>
	Maine nadadagdagan pa rin ang endorsement</h2>
<p>Gustuhin man ng<strong>GMA</strong>na papaghiwalayin ang AlDub tandem nina<strong>Alden Richards</strong>at<strong>Maine Mendoza,</strong> hindi nila magawa dahil tutol ang napakaraming tagasubaybay ng pareha. Maaari rin namang totoo na humihina na ang hatak ng dalawa pero hindi ito dapat maging dahilan para bigyan sila ng proyekto na hindi bagay sa kanila. Hiling lamang ng Aldub Nationay maalagaan ang pareha tulad ng pag-aalaga na ginagawa ng kalabang istasyon sa kanilang mga sikat na sikat nang<strong>KathNiel, JaDine,</strong>at<strong>LizQuen.</strong></p>
<p>Pero in fairness to Maine at Alden, humina man ang pareha nilamarami at patuloy ang pagdaragdag ng endorsements ni Maine at hindi nawawalan ng proyekto bilang solo artist si Alden.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<h2>
	Daniel babawi</h2>
<p>Binalikan ni Bulacan Vice Governor<strong>Daniel Fernando</strong>ang kanyang pag-aartista sa pamamagitan ng comeback project nina<strong>Kim Chiu</strong>at<strong>Gerald Anderson</strong>na <strong>Ikaw Lang ang Iibigin.</strong>Role ng ama ni Gerald na mukhang pera ang kanyang role.</p>
<p>Apat na taon matapos siyang huling umarte, excited na balikan ng aktor na pulitiko ang kanyang pag-aartista. Ganito katagal inabot ang pagsasaayos niya ng kanyang sked sa Kapitolyo na siyang dahilan kaya hindi siya nakatanggap ng role sa TV man o pelikula. Ayaw niyang may masabing hindi maganda ang mga nasasakupan niya kung kaya binibigyan prayoridad niya ang kanyang trabaho.</p>
<p>Juday mas piniling mag-host kesa makatambal si Richard</p>
<p>Lumalabas tuloy na parang trying hard si<strong>Richard Yap</strong>sa hindi na naman pagkakatuloy ng serye nila sa TV ni<strong>Judy Ann Santos</strong>. Mas pinaboran naman ngayon ng network ang paghu-host nito ng isang game show kaysa paggawa ng teleserye gayung si Juday na rin mismo ang nagsabi na gusto nitong gumawa ng isang light project kaysa isang dramang-drama na gaya nang gagawin sana nila ng tsinitong aktor.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

		width: 198px;
	}
	#___page_0 {
		left: -1px;
		position: relative;
		top: -1px;
	}
	#social-head li.spelement:hover .sp-wrap {
		opacity: 1;
		left: 50%;
	}
	.sp-wrap{
		background: url(http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/arrow-up.png) top center no-repeat;
		padding-top:9px;
		opacity: 0;
	    transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -moz-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -webkit-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    position: absolute;
		top: 20px;
		left: -2000px;
		margin-left: -106px;
		z-index: 500;
		width:210px;
		text-align:center;

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/nitz-miralles.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Bagong Bb. Pilipinas - Universe dyowa ng gobernador!                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1695857" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/02/1695857/bagong-bb.-pilipinas-universe-dyowa-ng-gobernador" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Nitz%20Miralles/ABOUT%20SHOWBIZ">ABOUT SHOWBIZ Ni Nitz Miralles</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 2, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/02/1695857/bagong-bb.-pilipinas-universe-dyowa-ng-gobernador" st_title="Bagong Bb. Pilipinas - Universe dyowa ng gobernador!    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/02/1695857/bagong-bb.-pilipinas-universe-dyowa-ng-gobernador" st_title="Bagong Bb. Pilipinas - Universe dyowa ng gobernador!   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/02/1695857/bagong-bb.-pilipinas-universe-dyowa-ng-gobernador" st_title="Bagong Bb. Pilipinas - Universe dyowa ng gobernador!   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/02/1695857/bagong-bb.-pilipinas-universe-dyowa-ng-gobernador" st_title="Bagong Bb. Pilipinas - Universe dyowa ng gobernador!   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/02/1695857/bagong-bb.-pilipinas-universe-dyowa-ng-gobernador" st_title="Bagong Bb. Pilipinas - Universe dyowa ng gobernador!   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/showbiz/20170502/Migs-Rachel.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Migz Villafuerte at Rachel Peters</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>P</strong>roud boyfriend si <strong>Migz Villafuerte </strong>ng bagong hirang na <strong>Bb. Pilipinas-Universe </strong>na si <strong>Rachel Peters. </strong>Post ni Migz sa Instagram (IG) pre-pageant: <em>So excited for Rachel! By far, you are the most genuine, sexiest and most beautiful of them all. so proud of you! lets goo.</em></p>
<p>Hinihintay ng followers ng dalawa ang bagong post ni Migz after the pageant at matapos ideklarang ang GF niya ang winner. For now, masaya ang followers nina Migz at Rachel na nagpalitan sila ng I love you sa IG.</p>
<p>Katuwa ang comment ng isang netizen na kung si <strong>Pia Wurtzbach </strong>ay may <strong>Marlon Stockinger, </strong>si <strong>Maxine Medina </strong>ay may <strong>Marx Topacio, </strong>si Rachel naman ay may Migz. Si Migz ay governor ng Camarines Sur.</p>
<h2>
	Marian may special delivery ng bulaklak sa Mothers Day</h2>
<p>Makikita na ng dad ni <strong>Marian Rivera </strong>ang apo niyang si <strong>Zia </strong>dahil last Sunday, bumiyahe sina Marian at <strong>Dingdong Dantes </strong>kasama ang anak patungong Spain. Tinupad ng mag-asawa ang pangako sa father ni Marian na dadalhin sa kanya ang apo.</p>
<p>Medyo matagal pa ang airing ng<strong>The Good Teacher</strong>ni Marian at baka maurong pa pag na-extend ang papalitang teleserye, kaya hindi masyadong nagmamadali ang production team. Saka si director <strong>LA Madridejos </strong>ay busy pa rin naman sa<strong>Meant To Be</strong><em>.</em></p>
<p>Wala pa ring balita kung kailan magsisimulang mag-taping si Dingdong sa Book 2 ng<strong>Alyas Robin Hood,</strong>wala pang story con at nagka-casting pa lang yata ang production team. Sa mga nakaka-miss sa aktor, abangan nyo muna siya sa<strong>Encantadia</strong>dahil gaya ni Marian na bumalik ang karakter na si Hara Mine-a, babalik din si Raquim.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>Samantala, nagpasalamat si Marian sa sumuporta sa soft opening ng Flora Vida by Marian. Successful ang opening, sold out ang flowers at may high demand, kaya bilang pasasalamat ay may free delivery in selected areas sa mga nag-order for Mothers Day.</p>
<p>Ang maganda pag nag-order ng flowers from Flora Vida ay may kasamang letter mula kay Marian.</p>
<h2>
	Jennylyn at Gil may bonding sa aso</h2>
<p>May countdown ang viewers na matagal nang naghintay sa airing ng<strong>My Love From The Star. </strong>Excited na silang mapanood ang Pinoy adaptation ng hit Korean rom-com series na bida ang bagong tambalan nina <strong>Jennylyn Mercado </strong>at <strong>Gil Cuerva. </strong>Nangunguna sa susuporta sa tambalan ngdalawa ang JenGil love team na busy sa social media sa pag-a-announce sa pilot ng show.</p>
<p>Daig ng fans ang <strong>GMA-7 </strong>na ayaw munang i-announce ang eksaktong petsa ng airing at naiintindihan namin. Pero ayaw magpapigil ng fans.</p>
<p>Maganda ang working relationship nina Jennylyn at Gil at sabi nga ni Jen, tapos na ang adjustment period sa showbiz ng kapareha at mas enjoy na siya ngayon. Kinakitaan niya ng willingness to learn ang newcomer at nagtatanong pag may hindi alam.</p>
<p>Dagdag bonding sa kanila ang pet dog ni Jennylyn na si Connor pag dinadala ng aktres sa taping dahil gusto ni Gil na siya ang mag-alaga nito. Dog lover din kasi ang binata.</p>
<h2>
	Kylie wala nang pag-asang makabalik sa pagtatapos ng Encantadia</h2>
<p>Naglungkot na naman ang viewers ng<strong>Encantadia</strong>sa announcement ng <strong>GMA-7 </strong>na Ang Huling Tatlong Linggo dahil hanggang May 19 na lang ang fantaserye. Hindi nakabawas sa lungkot ng viewers ang post ni direk Mark Reyes na <em>We need to end...so we can begin again. #encantadia #EncaLakbayPa.</em></p>
<p>May mga nagre-request na sana wala nang patayin sa cast<em>.</em>May request pang ibalik ang tambalang Alebarro nina Alena (<strong>Gabbi Garcia</strong>) at Ybarro (<strong>Ruru Madrid</strong>). Ang tila malabong mapagbigyan nina Suzette at direk Mark ay ibalik si Amihan (<strong>Kylie Padilla</strong>) dahil baka mahirapan sa taping.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>

<div id="block-views-balita-ngayon-block-3" class="block block-views">

    <h2><a href="/balita-ngayon" class="block-title-link">Balita Ngayon</a></h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="view view-balita-ngayon view-id-balita_ngayon view-display-id-block_3 breaking-news-list view-dom-id-7d59eee04f2c44fd29a8647451cf2418">

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Concert isinabay na Sharon sa amerika muna titira! Kim at Gerald parang may nararamdaman pa sa isat isa                  </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698057" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698057/concert-isinabay-na-sharon-sa-amerika-muna-titira-kim-gerald-parang" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author//SEEN%20SCENE">SEEN SCENE</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 9, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698057/concert-isinabay-na-sharon-sa-amerika-muna-titira-kim-gerald-parang" st_title="Concert isinabay na Sharon sa amerika muna titira! Kim at Gerald parang may nararamdaman pa sa isat isa     @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698057/concert-isinabay-na-sharon-sa-amerika-muna-titira-kim-gerald-parang" st_title="Concert isinabay na Sharon sa amerika muna titira! Kim at Gerald parang may nararamdaman pa sa isat isa    " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698057/concert-isinabay-na-sharon-sa-amerika-muna-titira-kim-gerald-parang" st_title="Concert isinabay na Sharon sa amerika muna titira! Kim at Gerald parang may nararamdaman pa sa isat isa    " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698057/concert-isinabay-na-sharon-sa-amerika-muna-titira-kim-gerald-parang" st_title="Concert isinabay na Sharon sa amerika muna titira! Kim at Gerald parang may nararamdaman pa sa isat isa    " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698057/concert-isinabay-na-sharon-sa-amerika-muna-titira-kim-gerald-parang" st_title="Concert isinabay na Sharon sa amerika muna titira! Kim at Gerald parang may nararamdaman pa sa isat isa    " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/showbiz/20170509/Kim.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Kim Chiu</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>S</strong><strong>EEN: </strong>Hindi abusado na kaibigan si <strong>Bret Jackson</strong> dahil tinanggihan niya ang free trip sa South Korea na alok ng kanyang bestfriend na si <strong>James Reid</strong>.</p>
<p><strong>SCENE: </strong>Matagal na mananatili sa US si <strong>Sharon Cuneta</strong> sa susunod na buwan hanggang sa July dahil sa mga concert niya sa California at New York.</p>
<p><strong>SEEN: </strong>Sandali lamang ang participation ni <strong>Heart Evangelista</strong> sa <strong>Mulawin vs. Ravena</strong> dahil bibigyan siya ng <strong>GMA-7</strong> ng teleserye na pagbibidahan niya.</p>
<p><strong>SCENE: </strong>Ang Mulawin vs. Ravena ang pinakamagastos na telefantasya ng <strong>GMA-7 </strong>dahil sa talent fees nina <strong>Dennis Trillo, Heart Evangelista, Lovi Poe, Carla Abellana </strong>at<strong> Regine Velasquez</strong>.</p>
<p><strong>SEEN: </strong>Umasa ang Kimerald fans na magkakaroon ng Part 2 ang relasyon nina <strong>Kim Chiu </strong>at <strong>Gerald Anderson</strong> dahil sa mga eksena ng dalawa sa guesting nila sa <strong>Gandang Gabi Vice </strong>noong Linggo. Parang may nararamdaman pa ang dalawa sa isat isa.</p>
<p><strong>SCENE: </strong>Malabo pa ang posibilidad na magkabalikan sa tunay na buhay sina Kim Chiu at Gerald Anderson dahil going strong ang relasyon nito kay <strong>Bea Alonzo</strong>. Ang love affair nina Gerald at Bea ang nagkaroon ng Part 2, hindi ang relasyon nina Gerald at Kim.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p><strong>SEEN: </strong>Dumaranas pa rin ng postpartum o post natal depression si <strong>Rufa Mae Quinto</strong> dahil nahihirapan siya na magpapayat at nami-miss na niya ang pagiging active sa showbiz.</p>
<p><strong>SCENE</strong>: Malakas ang hinala ni <strong>Lian Paz</strong> na kilala niya ang basher na gumagamit ng ibang pangalan at palaging nagkukumpara sa kanya kay <strong>LJ Reyes</strong>, ang girlfriend ng ex-husband niya na si <strong>Paolo Contis</strong>.</p>
<p><strong>SEEN</strong>: Mas maskulado na ngayon si <strong>Raymond Gutierrez</strong> kesa sa kanyang twin brother na si <strong>Richard</strong>. Inspirasyon si Raymond ng mga tao na nawalan ng pag-asa na pumayat.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

  <div class="content">
    <div class="view view-related-content view-id-related_content view-display-id-block view-dom-id-f39eae8d177d0bff22cf2c8fbb706adf">

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

  <div class="content">

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/salve-v-asis.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                Paano na si Liza? Kathryn napisil na nga bang Darna?                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698053" class="node node-article node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698053/paano-na-si-liza-kathryn-napisil-na-nga-bang-darna" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Salve%20V.%20Asis/"> Ni Salve V. Asis</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 9, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698053/paano-na-si-liza-kathryn-napisil-na-nga-bang-darna" st_title="Paano na si Liza? Kathryn napisil na nga bang Darna?    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698053/paano-na-si-liza-kathryn-napisil-na-nga-bang-darna" st_title="Paano na si Liza? Kathryn napisil na nga bang Darna?   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698053/paano-na-si-liza-kathryn-napisil-na-nga-bang-darna" st_title="Paano na si Liza? Kathryn napisil na nga bang Darna?   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698053/paano-na-si-liza-kathryn-napisil-na-nga-bang-darna" st_title="Paano na si Liza? Kathryn napisil na nga bang Darna?   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-showbiz/2017/05/09/1698053/paano-na-si-liza-kathryn-napisil-na-nga-bang-darna" st_title="Paano na si Liza? Kathryn napisil na nga bang Darna?   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/showbiz/20170509/Kathryn.jpg" alt="" /></div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-field-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even">Kathryn Bernardo</div>
      </div>
</div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><strong>S</strong>i <strong>Kathryn Bernardo</strong> na nga ba ang papalit kay <strong>Angel Locsin</strong> sa pelikulang <strong>Darna</strong>?</p>
<p>Yup, maghihiwalay na raw muna sina <strong>Daniel Padilla </strong>at Kathryn na huling napanood sa pelikulang <strong>Cant Help Falling In Love</strong> na palabas pa sa ibang mga sinehan hanggang ngayon.</p>
<p>Si Daniel daw kasi ay sasabak muna sa movie with <strong>Vice Ganda</strong> and <strong>2015 Miss U Pia Wurtzbach</strong> at si Kathryn nga ay sa Darna.</p>
<p>Pareho umanong isasali ang hiwalay na pelikula ng magka-loveteam ayon sa isang nagkuwento (na mukhang totoo naman) sa taunang film fiesta, ang <strong>Metro Manila Film Festival (MMFF</strong>).</p>
<div style="width:600px; background-color:#DDDDDD; color:#676767;clear:both; margin-bottom:20px">
	<img alt="" src=" http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/showbiz/20170509/Daniel.jpg" style="height: 400px; width: 600px;" /> Daniel Padilla</div>
<p>Yan lang naman ay kung pareho raw mapipili ng selection committee ng MMFF at matatapos nila ang pelikula sa deadline nitong October. Finished product ang demand ng committee sa mga pelikulang sasali tulad nung nakaraang taon kahit mukhang hindi naman lahat napanood ng members ng selection committee ang mga nagpasa ng pelikula.</p>
<p>Saka kung hindi naman napipili sa MMFF ay mas malaki ang kinikita ng <strong>Star Cinema</strong>. Tulad sa nangyari nung nakaraang taon kung saan hindi napili ang pelikula nina <strong>Vice Ganda</strong> at <strong>Coco Martin</strong> ganundin ang kay <strong>Vic Sotto</strong>. Nang ipalabas ang dalawang pelikula mas malaki pa ang kinita kesa sa over all income ng festival.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>So abang-abang tayo kung final and official na ba ang desisyon ng management ng <strong>KathNiel </strong>na paghiwalayin sila ng pelikula sa Pasko.</p>
<p>Nauna na rin kasing may nagkuwento na kay <strong>Liza Soberano</strong> raw ibinigay ang Darna movie at payag naman daw ang ka-loveteam nitong si <strong>Enrique Gil</strong>.</p>
<p>Pero bakit kaya lumutang ang pangalan ni Kathryn?</p>
<div style="width:600px; background-color:#DDDDDD; color:#676767;clear:both; margin-bottom:20px">
	<img alt="" src=" http://media.philstar.com/images/pilipino-star-ngayon/showbiz/20170509/Marian.jpg" style="height: 400px; width: 600px;" /> Marian at Zia</div>
<h2>
	<strong>Ay may daga nina Marian at Zia hanggang Italy na</strong></h2>
<p>Aliw ang ay may daga pose ng mag-inang <strong>Marian</strong> and <strong>Letezia Dantes</strong> kahit nasa ibang bansa sila.</p>
<p>Sa Instagram account ni <strong>Dingdong</strong> makikita ang mga nasabing photos ng mag-ina sa Santorini at sa Italy kung saan dumalo ng kasal ng kaibigan nilang stylist ang mag-asawa at anak. Nagkita-kita sila roon ng mag-asawang <strong>Ryan Agoncillo</strong> and <strong>Judy Ann Santos</strong>.</p>
<p>Cute nga ang photo nilang magkakasama<strong>. </strong></p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

      <div class="link-wrapper">
      <ul class="links inline"><li class="comment_forbidden first last"></li>
</ul>    </div>

      <div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">

<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");

	}
	.link-wrapper {
		position: relative;
		top: 33px;
	}
	.region.article-ad-region.clearfix.article-ad-box {
		width: 0;
	}
	#article-bottom #block-block-32 {
		margin-top: 10px;
		position: relative;
		top: 0;
	}
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">		
	jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
		$("#disqus-anchor").click(function(event) {
			event.preventDefault();
			$('html,body').animate({scrollTop:$(this.hash).offset().top}, 600);
		});
	});		
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->

          <div id="content" class="column"><div class="section">
                        <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <img class="article-author-photo img-left" src="http://www.philstar.com/sites/default/files/ColumnistPhotos/dr-willie-t-ong.jpg" />              <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
                 Mga pagkaing lunas  sa constipation                 </h1>
                                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <div id="node-1698784" class="node node-column node-full node-full clearfix" about="/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698784/mga-pagkaing-lunas-sa-constipation" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      
  <div class="article-author-date-info-wrapper"><span class="article-author-info"><a href="/author/Dr.%20Willie%20T.%20Ong/DOC%20WILLIE">DOC WILLIE Ni Dr. Willie T. Ong</a></span>&nbsp;<span class="article-entity-info">(Pilipino Star Ngayon) </span> | <span class="article-date-info">Updated May 11, 2017 - 12:00am</span></div>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="sharethis-buttons"><div class="sharethis-wrapper"><span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698784/mga-pagkaing-lunas-sa-constipation" st_title=" Mga pagkaing lunas  sa constipation    @pilstarngayon" class="st_twitter_hcount" displaytext="twitter"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698784/mga-pagkaing-lunas-sa-constipation" st_title=" Mga pagkaing lunas  sa constipation   " class="st_facebook_hcount" displaytext="facebook"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698784/mga-pagkaing-lunas-sa-constipation" st_title=" Mga pagkaing lunas  sa constipation   " class="st_googleplus_hcount" displaytext="googleplus"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698784/mga-pagkaing-lunas-sa-constipation" st_title=" Mga pagkaing lunas  sa constipation   " class="st_email_hcount" displaytext="email"></span>
<span st_url="http://www.philstar.com/psn-opinyon/2017/05/11/1698784/mga-pagkaing-lunas-sa-constipation" st_title=" Mga pagkaing lunas  sa constipation   " class="st_fblike_hcount" displaytext="fblike"></span>
<script type='text/javascript'>var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type='text/javascript' src='http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>stLight.options({publisher:'5ad44bb4-d58a-41b9-b6de-96e5bb795b3d'});</script></div></div>
<div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
          <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>PARA makaiwas sa pagtitibi o constipation, subukan ang mga payong ito. Uminom ng 8 hanggang 10 basong tubig bawat araw. Igalaw-galaw ang iyong katawan. Sanayin ang sarili na dumumi sa takdang oras.</p>
<p>Malaking tulong ang mga prutas at gulay para lumambot ang dumi. Kumain ng mga prutas tulad ng papaya, pakwan at peras. Kumain din ng ibat-ibang gulay na mataas sa fiber. Heto ang puwede niyong subukan:</p>
<p>1. Berdeng gulay tulad ng kangkong, spinach, pechay, malunggay at talbos ng kamote. Mataas ang gulay sa fiber na makatutulong sa pagiging regular ng pagdumi. Ang spinach ay may sangkap na magnesium na nagpapabilis ng galaw ng bituka para makarumi.</p>
<p>2. Okra  Sa mga gulay, kakaiba ang epekto ng okra para mapalambot ang dumi. Ang okra ay may malapot na likido na nagpapadulas sa pagdaan ng dumi. Ang balat ng okra ay mataas sa fiber na nagbibigay ng anyo (o porma) sa dumi. Dahil dito, mas bibilis ang paggalaw ng dumi. Piliin lamang ang okra na wala pang 4 inches para malambot pa itong kainin.</p>
<p>3. Oatmeal  Puwede kang kumain ng isang tasang oatmeal sa umaga. May sangkap itong beta-glucan (isang soluble fiber) na nagtatanggal ng kolesterol sa ating katawan at makatutulong din sa pagdumi.</p>
<p>4. Yogurt  Ang yogurt ay may taglay na mabuting bacteria na may benepisyo sa ating tiyan at bituka.</p><div id="block-philstar-ad-template-article-bottom" class="block block-philstar-ad">

    
  <div class="content">
    <span class="element-invisible">PSN ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: </span><script type="text/javascript" src="http://partner.googleadservices.com/gampad/google_service.js">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GS_googleAddAdSenseService("ca-pub-1876439796539993");
  GS_googleEnableAllServices();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleAddSlot("ca-pub-1876439796539993", "PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250"); 

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFetchAds();
</script>

 
<script type="text/javascript">
  GA_googleFillSlot("PSN_Bansa_Medallion_300x250");
</script>  </div>
</div>

<p>5. Tubig  Napakahalaga ang pag-inom ng sapat na tubig para sa mga nagtitibi. Ang mga pagkaing mataas sa fiber, tulad ng gulay, prutas at oatmeal, ay kailangang humalo muna sa tubig para maging malambot ang dumi. Subukang uminom ng 8 hanggang 10 basong tubig o likido sa maghapon. Kapag kulang ka sa tubig, siguradong titigas ang iyong dumi.</p>
<p>May iba pang pagkaing mataas sa fiber tulad ng brown rice. Pero kung hindi ka sanay sa pagkain nito ay baka magtae ka naman. Dahan-dahanin lang muna ang pagkain nito para masanay ang iyong tiyan. Sana ay makatulong itong mga payo para malunasan ang iyong pagtitibi. Good luck.</p>
</p></div>
      </div>
</div>
	<div id="yume-main-container"></div>
	<div id="AdAsia"></div>
  </div>

<style type="text/css">
		#social-head ul {
	  margin: 0;
	  padding: 0;
	}
	#social-head ul li a img:hover {
		opacity: 0.6;
	}
	#social-head li {
	  float: left;
	  height: 29px;
	  list-style-type: none;
	  list-style: none;
	  margin: 0 0 0 8px;
	  min-width: 20px;
	  position: relative;
	}
	.gplus-wrap {
		height: 284px;
		position: relative;
		width: 198px;
	}
	#___page_0 {
		left: -1px;
		position: relative;
		top: -1px;
	}
	#social-head li.spelement:hover .sp-wrap {
		opacity: 1;
		left: 50%;
	}
	.sp-wrap{
		background: url(http://www.philstar.com/sites/all/themes/philstar_default/images/social-plugins/arrow-up.png) top center no-repeat;
		padding-top:9px;
		opacity: 0;
	    transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -moz-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    -webkit-transition: opacity .5s ease-in-out;
	    position: absolute;
		top: 20px;
		left: -2000px;
		margin-left: -106px;
		z-index: 500;
		width:210px;
		text-align:center;
	}
	.sp-hover{
		background-color: #FFFFFF;
		border: 1px solid #808080;
		padding: 5px;
	}
	.link-wrapper {
		position: relative;
		top: 33px;
	}

		width: 0;
	}
	#article-bottom #block-block-32 {
		margin-top: 10px;
		position: relative;
		top: 0;
	}
</style>

	jQuery(document).ready(function($) {

<!--start author photo disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorphoto = ["Ni Edith Regalado", " Ni Edith Regalado"];
	for (var p = 0; p < authorphoto.length; p++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorphoto[p]) {
			$(".article-author-photo").css("display", "none");
			$(".article-author-photo").empty();
			$(".article-author-photo").hide();
			//alert (author[p]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end author photo disabled-->
<!--start feedback disabled-->
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	var authorcomment = ["SAPOL Ni Jarius Bondoc"];
	for (var c = 0; c < authorcomment.length; c++) {
		if ($(".article-author-info").text() == authorcomment[c]) {
			$("#disqus-anchor").empty();
			$("#block-disqus-disqus-comments").empty();			
			//alert (author[c]);
			}
		}
});
</script>
<!--end feedback disabled-->
<!--start of idle auto refresh-->
<script type="text/javascript">
var t;
	window.onload=resetTimer;
	document.onkeypress=resetTimer;
	document.onmousemove=resetTimer;
	document.onscroll=resetTimer;
function logout()
{
	window.location.reload();
}
function resetTimer()
{
	clearTimeout(t);
	t=setTimeout(logout,300000) //logs out set in minutes / setminute*60seconds*1000miliseconds / 5minutes = 300000
}
</script>
<!--end of idle auto refresh-->
